00311 // enumerated types used for the Video Conferencing Display
00312 enum
00313 {
00314       AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE,                                     // The video popup is not displayed
00315       AIM_VIDEO_POPUP_MODE,                                                               // The title bar pops up out of the Contact button
00316       AIM_VIDEO_INIT_MODE,                                                                // When the player first tries to contact the merc, it will be snowy for a bit
00317       AIM_VIDEO_FIRST_CONTACT_MERC_MODE,                    // The popup that is displayed when first contactinf the merc
00318       AIM_VIDEO_HIRE_MERC_MODE,                                                     // The popup which deals with the contract length, and transfer funds
00319       AIM_VIDEO_MERC_ANSWERING_MACHINE_MODE,          // The popup which will be instread of the AIM_VIDEO_FIRST_CONTACT_MERC_MODE if the merc is not there
00320       AIM_VIDEO_MERC_UNAVAILABLE_MODE,                            // The popup which will be instread of the AIM_VIDEO_FIRST_CONTACT_MERC_MODE if the merc is unavailable
00321       AIM_VIDEO_POPDOWN_MODE,                                                       // The title bars pops down to the contact button
00322 };

00558 void EnterInitAimMembers()
00559 {
00560       gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE;
00561       gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode = AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE;
00562       gfVideoFaceActive = FALSE;
00563 //fShouldMercTalk = FALSE;    
00564       gubPopUpBoxAction = AIM_POPUP_NOTHING;
00565       gfRedrawScreen = FALSE;
00566       giContractAmount = 0;
00567       giMercFaceIndex = 0;
00568       guiLastHandleMercTime = GetJA2Clock();
00569       gubCurrentCount = 0;
00570       gfFirstTimeInContactScreen = TRUE;
00571 
00572       //reset the variable so a pop up can be displyed this time in laptop
00573       LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.fHaveDisplayedPopUpInLaptop = FALSE;
00574 
00575             //reset the id of the last merc
00576       LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.iIdOfMerc = -1;
00577 }

00579 BOOLEAN EnterAIMMembers()
00580 {
00581   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
00582       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
00583 
00584       // Create a background video surface to blt the face onto
00585       vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
00586       vs_desc.usWidth = AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_WIDTH;
00587       vs_desc.usHeight = AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_HEIGHT;
00588       vs_desc.ubBitDepth = 16;
00589       CHECKF( AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &guiVideoFaceBackground) );
00590 
00591       // load the stats graphic and add it
00592       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00593       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\stats.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00594       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiStats));
00595 
00596       // load the Price graphic and add it
00597       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00598       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\price.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00599       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiPrice));
00600 
00601       // load the Portait graphic and add it
00602       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00603       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\portrait.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00604       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiPortrait));
00605 
00606       // load the WeaponBox graphic and add it
00607       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00608       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\weaponbox.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00609       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiWeaponBox));
00610 
00611       // load the videoconf Popup graphic and add it
00612       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00613       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\VideoConfPopup.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00614       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiVideoConfPopup));
00615 
00616       // load the video conf terminal graphic and add it
00617       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00618       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\VideoConfTerminal.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00619       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiVideoConfTerminal));
00620 
00621       // load the background snow for the video conf terminal 
00622       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00623       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\BWSnow.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00624       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiBWSnow));
00625 
00626       // load the fuzzy line for the video conf terminal 
00627       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00628       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\FuzzLine.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00629       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiFuzzLine));
00630 
00631       // load the line distortion for the video conf terminal 
00632       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00633       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\LineInterference.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00634       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiStraightLine));
00635 
00636       // load the translucent snow for the video conf terminal 
00637       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00638       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\TransSnow.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00639       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiTransSnow));
00640 
00641       // load the translucent snow for the video conf terminal 
00642       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
00643       FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\VideoContractCharge.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
00644       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiVideoContractCharge));
00645 
00646 
00647       //** Mouse Regions **
00648       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedFaceRegion, PORTRAIT_X, PORTRAIT_Y , PORTRAIT_X + PORTRAIT_WIDTH , PORTRAIT_Y + PORTRAIT_HEIGHT, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00649                                            CURSOR_WWW, SelectFaceMovementRegionCallBack, SelectFaceRegionCallBack ); 
00650   MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedFaceRegion); 
00651       
00652       //Set the fast help for the mouse region
00653 //    SetRegionFastHelpText( &gSelectedFaceRegion, AimMemberText[ AIM_MEMBER_CLICK_INSTRUCTIONS ] );
00654 
00655 
00656       // if user clicks in the area, the merc will shut up!
00657       MSYS_DefineRegion( &gSelectedShutUpMercRegion, LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y ,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X, LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH-1,
00658                                            CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, SelectShutUpMercRegionCallBack); 
00659       MSYS_AddRegion(&gSelectedShutUpMercRegion); 
00660       //have it disbled at first
00661   MSYS_DisableRegion(&gSelectedShutUpMercRegion); 
00662 
00663 
00664       //Button Regions
00665       giXToCloseVideoConfButtonImage = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\x_button.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00666 
00667 
00668       guiPreviousContactNextButtonImage =  LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\BottomButtons2.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
00669       
00670       giPreviousButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiPreviousContactNextButtonImage, CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_PREVIOUS], AIM_M_FONT_PREV_NEXT_CONTACT, 
00671                                                                                AIM_M_FONT_PREV_NEXT_CONTACT_COLOR_UP, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00672                                                                                AIM_M_FONT_PREV_NEXT_CONTACT_COLOR_DOWN, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00673                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00674                                                                                PREVIOUS_X, PREVIOUS_BOX_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00675                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnPreviousButtonCallback);
00676       SetButtonCursor(giPreviousButton, CURSOR_WWW );
00677 
00678 
00679       giContactButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiPreviousContactNextButtonImage, CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_CONTACT], AIM_M_FONT_PREV_NEXT_CONTACT, 
00680                                                                                AIM_M_FONT_PREV_NEXT_CONTACT_COLOR_UP, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00681                                                                                AIM_M_FONT_PREV_NEXT_CONTACT_COLOR_DOWN, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00682                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00683                                                                                CONTACT_X, CONTACT_BOX_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00684                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnContactButtonCallback);
00685       SetButtonCursor(giContactButton, CURSOR_WWW );
00686 
00687 
00688 
00689       giNextButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiPreviousContactNextButtonImage, CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_NEXT], AIM_M_FONT_PREV_NEXT_CONTACT, 
00690                                                                                AIM_M_FONT_PREV_NEXT_CONTACT_COLOR_UP, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00691                                                                                AIM_M_FONT_PREV_NEXT_CONTACT_COLOR_DOWN, DEFAULT_SHADOW, 
00692                                                                                TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
00693                                                                                NEXT_X, NEXT_BOX_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
00694                                                                                DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnNextButtonCallback);
00695       SetButtonCursor(giNextButton, CURSOR_WWW );
00696 
00697 
00698       gbCurrentSoldier = AimMercArray[gbCurrentIndex];
00699 
00700       gfStopMercFromTalking = FALSE;
00701       gubVideoConferencingMode = (UINT8)giCurrentSubPage;
00702       gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode = AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE;
00703 
00704       gfRenderTopLevel = FALSE;
00705 
00706       // if we are re-entering but the video conference should still be up
00707       if( gubVideoConferencingMode != 0 )
00708       {
00709             //if we need to re initialize the talking face
00710             if( gubVideoConferencingMode !=  AIM_VIDEO_FIRST_CONTACT_MERC_MODE)
00711                   InitVideoFace(gbCurrentSoldier);
00712 
00713             InitDeleteVideoConferencePopUp();
00714       }
00715 
00716       
00717             
00718 
00719       InitAimMenuBar();
00720       InitAimDefaults();
00721 
00722       //LoadTextMercPopupImages( BASIC_MERC_POPUP_BACKGROUND, BASIC_MERC_POPUP_BORDER);
00723 
00724       RenderAIMMembers();
00725       gfIsNewMailFlagSet = FALSE;
00726       gfAimMemberCanMercSayOpeningQuote = TRUE;
00727 
00728       return( TRUE );
00729 }
00730 
00731 void ExitAIMMembers()
00732 {
00733       RemoveAimDefaults();
00734 
00735       //if we are exiting and the transfer of funds popup is enable, make sure we dont come back to it
00736       if( gubPopUpBoxAction )
00737             giCurrentSubPage = AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE;
00738       else
00739             giCurrentSubPage = gubVideoConferencingMode;
00740 
00741       gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE;
00742       InitDeleteVideoConferencePopUp( );
00743 
00744 
00745 
00746       DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex(guiVideoFaceBackground);
00747 
00748       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiStats);
00749       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiPrice);
00750       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiPortrait);
00751       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiWeaponBox);
00752       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiVideoConfPopup);
00753       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiVideoConfTerminal);
00754       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiBWSnow);
00755       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiFuzzLine);
00756       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiStraightLine);
00757       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiTransSnow);
00758       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiVideoContractCharge);
00759 
00760       UnloadButtonImage( guiPreviousContactNextButtonImage );
00761       UnloadButtonImage( giXToCloseVideoConfButtonImage );
00762 
00763       RemoveButton( giPreviousButton );
00764       RemoveButton( giContactButton );
00765       RemoveButton( giNextButton );
00766 
00767   MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedFaceRegion);
00768       MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gSelectedShutUpMercRegion);
00769 
00770       ExitAimMenuBar();
00771 
00772       InitCreateDeleteAimPopUpBox(AIM_POPUP_DELETE, NULL, NULL, 0, 0, 0);
00773 
00774       RemoveTextMercPopupImages( );
00775 
00776 }
00777 
00778 void HandleAIMMembers()
00779 {
00780       //determine if the merc has a quote that is waiting to be said
00781       DelayMercSpeech( 0, 0, 0, FALSE, FALSE );
00782 
00783       if( gfHangUpMerc && !gfMercIsTalking)
00784       {
00785             if( gubVideoConferencingMode != AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE )
00786                   gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_POPDOWN_MODE;
00787             gfHangUpMerc = FALSE;
00788       }
00789 
00790       if( gfStopMercFromTalking )
00791       {
00792             StopMercTalking();
00793             gfStopMercFromTalking = FALSE;
00794 /*
00795             //if we were waiting for the merc to stop talking
00796             if( gfWaitingForMercToStopTalkingOrUserToClick )
00797             {
00798                   gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_POPDOWN_MODE;
00799                   gfWaitingForMercToStopTalkingOrUserToClick = FALSE;
00800             }
00801 */
00802       }
00803 
00804       // If we have to change video conference modes, change to new mode
00805       if( gubVideoConferencingMode != gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode && gubPopUpBoxAction != AIM_POPUP_DISPLAY )
00806       {
00807             InitDeleteVideoConferencePopUp( );
00808 
00809             //if we are exiting to display a popup box, dont rerender the display
00810             if( !fExitDueToMessageBox )
00811                   gfRedrawScreen = TRUE;
00812       }
00813 
00814 
00815       // If we have to get rid of the popup box
00816       if( gubPopUpBoxAction == AIM_POPUP_DELETE )
00817       {
00818             InitCreateDeleteAimPopUpBox(AIM_POPUP_DELETE, NULL, NULL, 0, 0, 0);
00819       
00820             //if we are exiting to display a popup box, dont rerender the display
00821             if( !fExitDueToMessageBox )
00822                   gfRedrawScreen = TRUE;
00823       }
00824 
00825       // Handle the current video conference screen
00826       HandleCurrentVideoConfMode();
00827 
00828       //If the answering machine is active, display the graphics for it
00829 //    if( gfIsAnsweringMachineActive )
00830 //          HandleAnsweringMachineMessage();
00831 
00832       // if the face is active, display the talking face
00833       if( gfVideoFaceActive )
00834       {
00835             gfMercIsTalking = DisplayTalkingMercFaceForVideoPopUp( giMercFaceIndex );
00836 
00837             //put the noise lines on the screen
00838             if( !gfIsAnsweringMachineActive )
00839                   HandleVideoDistortion();
00840 
00841             //to handle when/if the merc is getting po'ed (waiting for player to do something)
00842             if( !gfMercIsTalking )
00843                   HandleMercAttitude();
00844       }
00845 
00846       //if we have to rerender the popup, set the flag to render the PostButtonRender function in laptop.c
00847       if( gubPopUpBoxAction == AIM_POPUP_DISPLAY )
00848       {
00849             fReDrawPostButtonRender = TRUE;
00850       }
00851 
00852       //Gets set in the InitDeleteVideoConferencePopUp() function
00853       if( gfJustSwitchedVideoConferenceMode )
00854             gfJustSwitchedVideoConferenceMode = FALSE;
00855 
00856 
00857       if( gfRedrawScreen )
00858       {
00859             RenderAIMMembers();
00860             gfRedrawScreen = FALSE;
00861       }
00862 
00863       #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
00864       TempHandleAimMemberKeyBoardInput();
00865       #endif
00866 
00867 
00868   MarkButtonsDirty( );
00869 }
00870 
00871 BOOLEAN RenderAIMMembersTopLevel()
00872 {
00873       InitCreateDeleteAimPopUpBox( AIM_POPUP_DISPLAY, NULL, NULL, 0, 0, 0);
00874 
00875       return(TRUE);
00876 }
00877 
00878 BOOLEAN RenderAIMMembers()
00879 {
00880   HVOBJECT  hStatsHandle;
00881   HVOBJECT  hPriceHandle;
00882   HVOBJECT  hWeaponBoxHandle;
00883       UINT16            x, uiPosX;
00884       wchar_t           wTemp[50];
00885 
00886       DrawAimDefaults();
00887 
00888       // Stats
00889       GetVideoObject(&hStatsHandle, guiStats);
00890   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hStatsHandle, 0,STATS_X, STATS_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00891 
00892       // Price
00893       GetVideoObject(&hPriceHandle, guiPrice);
00894   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPriceHandle, 0,PRICE_X, PRICE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00895 
00896       // WeaponBox
00897       GetVideoObject(&hWeaponBoxHandle, guiWeaponBox);
00898 
00899       uiPosX = WEAPONBOX_X;
00900       for(x=0; x<WEAPONBOX_NUMBER; x++)
00901       {
00902             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hWeaponBoxHandle, 0, uiPosX, WEAPONBOX_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
00903             uiPosX += WEAPONBOX_SIZE_X;
00904       }
00905 
00906   UpdateMercInfo();
00907 
00908       //Draw fee & contract
00909       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_FEE], FEE_X, FEE_Y, 0, AIM_M_FONT_PREV_NEXT_CONTACT, AIM_M_FEE_CONTRACT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
00910       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_CONTRACT], AIM_CONTRACT_X, AIM_CONTRACT_Y, AIM_CONTRACT_WIDTH, AIM_M_FONT_PREV_NEXT_CONTACT, AIM_M_FEE_CONTRACT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED  );
00911 
00912       //Draw pay period (day, week, 2 week)
00913       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_1_DAY], ONEDAY_X, EXPLEVEL_Y, AIM_CONTRACT_WIDTH, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED    );
00914       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_1_WEEK], ONEWEEK_X, MARKSMAN_Y, AIM_CONTRACT_WIDTH, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED  );
00915       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_2_WEEKS], TWOWEEK_X, MECHANAICAL_Y, AIM_CONTRACT_WIDTH, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED    );
00916 
00917       //Display AIM Member text
00918       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_ACTIVE_MEMBERS], AIM_MEMBER_ACTIVE_TEXT_X, AIM_MEMBER_ACTIVE_TEXT_Y, AIM_MEMBER_ACTIVE_TEXT_WIDTH, AIM_MAINTITLE_FONT, AIM_M_ACTIVE_MEMBER_TITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED    );
00919 
00920       //Display Option Gear Cost text
00921       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_OPTIONAL_GEAR], AIM_MEMBER_OPTIONAL_GEAR_X, AIM_MEMBER_OPTIONAL_GEAR_Y, 0, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED    );
00922 
00923       swprintf(wTemp, L"%d", gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].usOptionalGearCost);
00924       InsertCommasForDollarFigure( wTemp );
00925       InsertDollarSignInToString( wTemp );
00926       uiPosX = AIM_MEMBER_OPTIONAL_GEAR_X + StringPixLength( CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_OPTIONAL_GEAR], AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT) + 5;
00927       DrawTextToScreen(wTemp, uiPosX, AIM_MEMBER_OPTIONAL_GEAR_Y, 0, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_DYNAMIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED   );
00928 
00929       DisableAimButton();
00930 
00931       DisplayMercsInventory(gbCurrentSoldier);
00932 
00933 
00934       DisplayMercsFace();
00935 
00936       if( gubVideoConferencingMode)
00937       {
00938             DisplayMercStats();
00939             DisplayVideoConferencingDisplay();
00940       }
00941       else
00942       {
00943             //Display the mercs stats and face
00944             DisplayMercStats();
00945 
00946             gubMercAttitudeLevel=0;
00947             gfIsAnsweringMachineActive = FALSE;
00948       }
00949 
00950 //    InitCreateDeleteAimPopUpBox( AIM_POPUP_DISPLAY, NULL, NULL, 0, 0, 0);
00951 
00952       //check to see if the merc is dead if so disable the contact button
00953       if( IsMercDead( gbCurrentSoldier ) )
00954       {
00955             DisableButton( giContactButton );
00956       }
00957       else
00958       {
00959             EnableButton( giContactButton );
00960       }
00961 
00962 
00963       //if we are to renbder the 'click face' text
00964       if(   gfAimMemberDisplayFaceHelpText )
00965       {
00966             DisplayAimMemberClickOnFaceHelpText();
00967       }
00968 
00969 
00970 
00971 
00972       RenderWWWProgramTitleBar( );
00973       DisplayProgramBoundingBox( TRUE );
00974       fReDrawScreenFlag = TRUE;
00975       
00976       return(TRUE);
00977 }
00978 
00979 
00980 BOOLEAN DrawNumeralsToScreen(INT32 iNumber, INT8 bWidth, UINT16 usLocX, UINT16 usLocY, UINT32 ulFont, UINT8 ubColor)
00981 {
00982       wchar_t           sStr[10];
00983 
00984       swprintf(sStr, L"%d", iNumber); 
00985 
00986       DrawTextToScreen(sStr, usLocX, usLocY, bWidth, ulFont, ubColor, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED   );
00987 
00988       return(TRUE);
00989 }
00990 
00991 BOOLEAN DrawMoneyToScreen(INT32 iNumber, INT8 bWidth, UINT16 usLocX, UINT16 usLocY, UINT32 ulFont, UINT8 ubColor)
00992 {
00993       wchar_t           sStr[10];
00994 
00995       swprintf(sStr, L"%d",iNumber);
00996       InsertCommasForDollarFigure( sStr );
00997       InsertDollarSignInToString( sStr );
00998 
00999 //    DrawTextToScreen(L"$", usLocX, usLocY, 0, ulFont, ubColor, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01000       DrawTextToScreen(sStr, usLocX, usLocY, bWidth, ulFont, ubColor, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED   );
01001 
01002       return(TRUE);
01003 }
01004 
01005 
01006 void SelectFaceRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01007 { 
01008       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
01009       {
01010       }
01011       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
01012       {
01013             guiCurrentLaptopMode = LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS_FACIAL_INDEX;
01014       } 
01015       else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01016       {
01017             //if the merc is not dead, video conference with the merc
01018             if( !IsMercDead( gbCurrentSoldier ) )
01019             {
01020                   gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_POPUP_MODE;
01021                   gfFirstTimeInContactScreen = TRUE;
01022             }
01023       } 
01024 }
01025 
01026 void SelectFaceMovementRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01027 { 
01028       if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE )
01029       {
01030             gfAimMemberDisplayFaceHelpText = FALSE;
01031             gfRedrawScreen = TRUE;
01032       }
01033       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_GAIN_MOUSE )
01034       {
01035             gfAimMemberDisplayFaceHelpText = TRUE;
01036             gfRedrawScreen = TRUE;
01037       }
01038       else if( iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_MOVE )
01039       {
01040       }
01041 }

01043 
01044 
01045 BOOLEAN     UpdateMercInfo(void)
01046 {
01047       //UINT16                            PosY = 300;
01048   wchar_t                           MercInfoString[ SIZE_MERC_BIO_INFO ];
01049   wchar_t                           AdditionalInfoString[ SIZE_MERC_BIO_INFO ];
01050 
01051       //Display the salaries
01052       DrawMoneyToScreen(gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].sSalary, FEE_WIDTH, FEE_X, HEALTH_Y, AIM_M_NUMBER_FONT, AIM_M_COLOR_DYNAMIC_TEXT  );
01053       DrawMoneyToScreen(gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].uiWeeklySalary, FEE_WIDTH, FEE_X, AGILITY_Y, AIM_M_NUMBER_FONT, AIM_M_COLOR_DYNAMIC_TEXT      );
01054       DrawMoneyToScreen(gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].uiBiWeeklySalary, FEE_WIDTH, FEE_X, DEXTERITY_Y, AIM_M_NUMBER_FONT, AIM_M_COLOR_DYNAMIC_TEXT  );
01055 
01056       //if medical deposit is required
01057       if( gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bMedicalDeposit )
01058       {
01059             wchar_t     zTemp[40];
01060             wchar_t     sMedicalString[40];
01061 
01062             // Display the medical cost
01063             swprintf( zTemp, L"%d", gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].sMedicalDepositAmount ); 
01064             InsertCommasForDollarFigure( zTemp );
01065             InsertDollarSignInToString( zTemp );
01066 
01067             swprintf( sMedicalString, L"%s %s", zTemp, CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_MEDICAL_DEPOSIT_REQ] ); 
01068       
01069             // If the string will be displayed in more then 2 lines, recenter the string
01070             if( ( DisplayWrappedString( 0, 0, AIM_MEDICAL_DEPOSIT_WIDTH, 2, AIM_FONT12ARIAL, AIM_M_COLOR_DYNAMIC_TEXT,  sMedicalString, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED | DONT_DISPLAY_TEXT ) / GetFontHeight( AIM_FONT12ARIAL ) ) > 2 )
01071             {
01072                   DisplayWrappedString( AIM_MEDICAL_DEPOSIT_X, (UINT16)(AIM_MEDICAL_DEPOSIT_Y - GetFontHeight( AIM_FONT12ARIAL ) ), AIM_MEDICAL_DEPOSIT_WIDTH, 2, AIM_FONT12ARIAL, AIM_M_COLOR_DYNAMIC_TEXT,  sMedicalString, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
01073             }
01074             else
01075                   DisplayWrappedString(AIM_MEDICAL_DEPOSIT_X, AIM_MEDICAL_DEPOSIT_Y, AIM_MEDICAL_DEPOSIT_WIDTH, 2, AIM_FONT12ARIAL, AIM_M_COLOR_DYNAMIC_TEXT,  sMedicalString, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
01076       }
01077 
01078       LoadMercBioInfo( gbCurrentSoldier, MercInfoString, AdditionalInfoString);
01079       if( MercInfoString[0] != 0)
01080       {
01081             DisplayWrappedString(AIM_MERC_INFO_X, AIM_MERC_INFO_Y, AIM_MERC_INFO_WIDTH, 2, AIM_M_FONT_DYNAMIC_TEXT, AIM_FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, MercInfoString, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01082       }
01083       if( AdditionalInfoString[0] != 0)
01084       {
01085             DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_ADDTNL_INFO], AIM_MERC_ADD_X, AIM_MERC_ADD_Y, 0, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01086             DisplayWrappedString(AIM_MERC_ADD_INFO_X, AIM_MERC_ADD_INFO_Y, AIM_MERC_INFO_WIDTH, 2, AIM_M_FONT_DYNAMIC_TEXT, AIM_FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, AdditionalInfoString, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01087       }
01088 
01089       return(TRUE);
01090 }
01091 
01092 
01093 
01094 BOOLEAN LoadMercBioInfo(UINT8 ubIndex, STR16 pInfoString, STR16 pAddInfo)
01095 {
01096       HWFILE            hFile;
01097       UINT32            uiBytesRead;
01098       UINT16            i;
01099       UINT32            uiStartSeekAmount;
01100 
01101 
01102       hFile = FileOpen(MERCBIOSFILENAME, FILE_ACCESS_READ, FALSE);
01103       if ( !hFile )
01104       {
01105             return( FALSE );
01106       }
01107 
01108 
01109       // Get current mercs bio info
01110       uiStartSeekAmount = (SIZE_MERC_BIO_INFO + SIZE_MERC_ADDITIONAL_INFO) * ubIndex;
01111 
01112       if ( FileSeek( hFile, uiStartSeekAmount, FILE_SEEK_FROM_START ) == FALSE )
01113       {
01114             return( FALSE );
01115       }
01116 
01117       if( !FileRead( hFile, pInfoString, SIZE_MERC_BIO_INFO, &uiBytesRead) )
01118       {
01119             return( FALSE );
01120       }
01121 
01122       // Decrement, by 1, any value > 32
01123       for(i=0; (i<SIZE_MERC_BIO_INFO) && (pInfoString[i] != 0); i++ )
01124       {
01125             if( pInfoString[i] > 33 )
01126                   pInfoString[i] -= 1;
01127             #ifdef POLISH
01128                   switch( pInfoString[ i ] )
01129                   {
01130                         case 260:         pInfoString[ i ] = 165;       break;
01131                         case 262:         pInfoString[ i ] = 198;       break;
01132                         case 280:         pInfoString[ i ] = 202;       break;
01133                         case 321:         pInfoString[ i ] = 163;       break;
01134                         case 323:         pInfoString[ i ] = 209;       break;
01135                         case 211:         pInfoString[ i ] = 211;       break;
01136 
01137                         case 346:         pInfoString[ i ] = 338;       break;
01138                         case 379:         pInfoString[ i ] = 175;       break;
01139                         case 377:         pInfoString[ i ] = 143;       break;
01140                         case 261:         pInfoString[ i ] = 185;       break;
01141                         case 263:         pInfoString[ i ] = 230;       break;
01142                         case 281:         pInfoString[ i ] = 234;       break;
01143 
01144                         case 322:         pInfoString[ i ] = 179;       break;
01145                         case 324:         pInfoString[ i ] = 241;       break;
01146                         case 243:         pInfoString[ i ] = 243;       break;
01147                         case 347:         pInfoString[ i ] = 339;       break;
01148                         case 380:         pInfoString[ i ] = 191;       break;
01149                         case 378:         pInfoString[ i ] = 376;       break;
01150                   }
01151             #endif
01152       }
01153 
01154 
01155       // Get the additional info
01156       uiStartSeekAmount = ((SIZE_MERC_BIO_INFO + SIZE_MERC_ADDITIONAL_INFO) * ubIndex )+ SIZE_MERC_BIO_INFO ;
01157       if ( FileSeek( hFile, uiStartSeekAmount, FILE_SEEK_FROM_START ) == FALSE )
01158       {
01159             return( FALSE );
01160       }
01161 
01162       if( !FileRead( hFile, pAddInfo, SIZE_MERC_ADDITIONAL_INFO, &uiBytesRead) )
01163       {
01164             return( FALSE );
01165       }
01166 
01167       // Decrement, by 1, any value > 32
01168       for(i=0; (i<SIZE_MERC_BIO_INFO) && (pAddInfo[i] != 0); i++ )
01169       {
01170             if( pAddInfo[i] > 33 )
01171                   pAddInfo[i] -= 1;
01172             #ifdef POLISH
01173                   switch( pAddInfo[ i ] )
01174                   {
01175                         case 260:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 165;          break;
01176                         case 262:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 198;          break;
01177                         case 280:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 202;          break;
01178                         case 321:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 163;          break;
01179                         case 323:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 209;          break;
01180                         case 211:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 211;          break;
01181 
01182                         case 346:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 338;          break;
01183                         case 379:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 175;          break;
01184                         case 377:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 143;          break;
01185                         case 261:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 185;          break;
01186                         case 263:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 230;          break;
01187                         case 281:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 234;          break;
01188 
01189                         case 322:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 179;          break;
01190                         case 324:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 241;          break;
01191                         case 243:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 243;          break;
01192                         case 347:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 339;          break;
01193                         case 380:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 191;          break;
01194                         case 378:         pAddInfo[ i ] = 376;          break;
01195                   }
01196             #endif
01197       }
01198 
01199       FileClose(hFile);
01200       return(TRUE);
01201 }
01202 
01203 
01204 BOOLEAN DisplayMercsInventory(UINT8 ubMercID)
01205 {
01206       UINT8                   i;
01207       INT16                   PosX, PosY, sCenX, sCenY;
01208       UINT16                  usItem;
01209       INVTYPE                 *pItem;
01210       HVOBJECT          hVObject;
01211       UINT32                  usHeight, usWidth;
01212   ETRLEObject     *pTrav;
01213       UINT16                  gzItemName[ SIZE_ITEM_NAME ];
01214       UINT8                   ubItemCount=0;
01215 //    UINT16                  gzTempItemName[ SIZE_ITEM_INFO ];
01216 
01217       //if the mercs inventory has already been purchased, dont display the inventory
01218       if( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].ubMiscFlags & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_ALREADY_USED_ITEMS )
01219             return( TRUE );
01220 
01221 
01222       PosY = WEAPONBOX_Y;
01223       PosX = WEAPONBOX_X+3;         // + 3 ( 1 to take care of the shadow, +2 to get past the weapon box border )
01224       for(i=0; i<NUM_INV_SLOTS; i++)
01225       {
01226             usItem = gMercProfiles[ubMercID].inv[ i ];
01227 
01228             //if its a valid item AND we are only displaying less then 8 items
01229             if( usItem && ubItemCount < WEAPONBOX_NUMBER )
01230             {
01231                   //increase the item count
01232                   ubItemCount++;
01233 
01234                   pItem = &Item[ usItem ];
01235                   GetVideoObject( &hVObject, GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( pItem ) );
01236                   pTrav = &(hVObject->pETRLEObject[ pItem->ubGraphicNum ] );
01237       
01238                   usHeight                      = (UINT32)pTrav->usHeight;
01239                   usWidth                             = (UINT32)pTrav->usWidth;
01240 
01241                   sCenX = PosX + ( abs( WEAPONBOX_SIZE_X - 3 - usWidth ) /  2 ) - pTrav->sOffsetX;
01242                   sCenY = PosY + ( abs( WEAPONBOX_SIZE_Y - usHeight ) / 2 ) - pTrav->sOffsetY;
01243 
01244                   //blt the shadow of the item
01245                   if(gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SHOW_ITEM_SHADOW ]) BltVideoObjectOutlineShadowFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( pItem ), pItem->ubGraphicNum, sCenX-2, sCenY+2);
01246                   //blt the item
01247                   BltVideoObjectOutlineFromIndex( FRAME_BUFFER, GetInterfaceGraphicForItem( pItem ), pItem->ubGraphicNum, sCenX, sCenY, 0, FALSE );
01248 
01249 
01250                   //if there are more then 1 piece of equipment in the current slot, display how many there are
01251                   if( gMercProfiles[ubMercID].bInvNumber[ i ] > 1 )
01252                   {
01253                         wchar_t zTempStr[ 32 ];
01254 //                      UINT16      usWidthOfNumber;
01255 
01256                         swprintf( zTempStr, L"x%d", gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bInvNumber[ i ] );
01257 
01258                         DrawTextToScreen( zTempStr, (UINT16)(PosX-1), (UINT16)(PosY+20), AIM_MEMBER_WEAPON_NAME_WIDTH, AIM_M_FONT_DYNAMIC_TEXT, AIM_M_WEAPON_TEXT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, RIGHT_JUSTIFIED );
01259                   }
01260                   else
01261                   {
01262                   }
01263       
01264                   wcscpy( gzItemName, ShortItemNames[ usItem ] );
01265 
01266                   //if this will only be a single line, center it in the box
01267                   if( ( DisplayWrappedString( (UINT16)(PosX-1), AIM_MEMBER_WEAPON_NAME_Y, AIM_MEMBER_WEAPON_NAME_WIDTH, 2, AIM_M_WEAPON_TEXT_FONT, AIM_M_WEAPON_TEXT_COLOR,  gzItemName, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED | DONT_DISPLAY_TEXT ) / GetFontHeight( AIM_M_WEAPON_TEXT_FONT ) ) == 1 )
01268                         DisplayWrappedString( (UINT16)(PosX-1), (UINT16)(AIM_MEMBER_WEAPON_NAME_Y+GetFontHeight( AIM_M_WEAPON_TEXT_FONT )/2), AIM_MEMBER_WEAPON_NAME_WIDTH, 2, AIM_M_WEAPON_TEXT_FONT, AIM_M_WEAPON_TEXT_COLOR,  gzItemName, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
01269                   else
01270                         DisplayWrappedString( (UINT16)(PosX-1), AIM_MEMBER_WEAPON_NAME_Y, AIM_MEMBER_WEAPON_NAME_WIDTH, 2, AIM_M_WEAPON_TEXT_FONT, AIM_M_WEAPON_TEXT_COLOR,  gzItemName, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
01271 
01272                   PosX += WEAPONBOX_SIZE_X;
01273             }
01274       }
01275 
01276       return(TRUE);
01277 }

01280 
01281 
01282 void BtnPreviousButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01283 {
01284       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01285       {
01286             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01287             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01288       }
01289       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01290       {
01291             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
01292             {
01293                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01294 
01295                   InitCreateDeleteAimPopUpBox(AIM_POPUP_DELETE, NULL, NULL, 0, 0, 0);
01296 
01297                   if( gbCurrentIndex > 0)
01298                         gbCurrentIndex--;
01299                   else
01300                         gbCurrentIndex = MAX_NUMBER_MERCS - 1;
01301 
01302                   gfRedrawScreen = TRUE;
01303 
01304                   gbCurrentSoldier = AimMercArray[gbCurrentIndex];
01305 
01306                   gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE;
01307                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01308             }
01309       }
01310       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
01311       {
01312             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01313             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01314       }
01315 } 
01316 
01317 void BtnContactButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01318 {
01319       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01320       {
01321             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01322             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01323       }
01324       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01325       {
01326             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
01327             {
01328                   //if we are not already in the video conferemce mode, go in to it
01329                   if( !gubVideoConferencingMode) 
01330                   {
01331                         
01332                         gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_POPUP_MODE;
01333 //                      gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_INIT_MODE;
01334                         gfFirstTimeInContactScreen = TRUE;
01335                   }
01336 
01337                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01338 
01339                   InitCreateDeleteAimPopUpBox(AIM_POPUP_DELETE, NULL, NULL, 0, 0, 0);
01340 
01341                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01342             }
01343       }
01344       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
01345       {
01346             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01347             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01348       }
01349 } 
01350 
01351 void BtnNextButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01352 {
01353       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01354       {
01355             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01356             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01357       }
01358       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01359       {
01360             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
01361             {
01362                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01363                   InitCreateDeleteAimPopUpBox(AIM_POPUP_DELETE, NULL, NULL, 0, 0, 0);
01364 
01365                   if( gbCurrentIndex < MAX_NUMBER_MERCS-1 )
01366                         gbCurrentIndex++;
01367                   else
01368                         gbCurrentIndex = 0;
01369 
01370                   gbCurrentSoldier = AimMercArray[gbCurrentIndex];
01371 
01372                   gfRedrawScreen = TRUE;              
01373 
01374                   gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE;
01375 
01376                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01377             }
01378       }
01379       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
01380       {
01381             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01382             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01383       }
01384 } 
01385 
01386 
01387 BOOLEAN DisplayMercsFace()
01388 {
01389   HVOBJECT hFaceHandle;
01390   HVOBJECT hPortraitHandle;
01391       STR                                       sFaceLoc = "FACES\\BIGFACES\\";
01392       char                                sTemp[100];
01393   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
01394       SOLDIERTYPE             *pSoldier=NULL;
01395 
01396       //See if the merc is currently hired
01397       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( gbCurrentSoldier, TRUE );
01398 
01399       // Portrait Frame
01400       GetVideoObject(&hPortraitHandle, guiPortrait);
01401   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPortraitHandle, 0,PORTRAIT_X, PORTRAIT_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01402 
01403       // load the Face graphic and add it
01404   sprintf(sTemp, "%s%02d.sti", sFaceLoc, gbCurrentSoldier);
01405       VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
01406       FilenameForBPP(sTemp, VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
01407       CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiFace));
01408 
01409       //Blt face to screen 
01410       GetVideoObject(&hFaceHandle, guiFace);
01411   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFaceHandle, 0,FACE_X, FACE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01412 
01413       //if the merc is dead
01414       if( IsMercDead( gbCurrentSoldier ) )
01415       {
01416             //shade the face red, (to signif that he is dead)
01417             hFaceHandle->pShades[ 0 ]           = Create16BPPPaletteShaded( hFaceHandle->pPaletteEntry, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_RED, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_GREEN, DEAD_MERC_COLOR_BLUE, TRUE );
01418 
01419             //get the face object
01420             GetVideoObject(&hFaceHandle, guiFace);
01421 
01422             //set the red pallete to the face
01423             SetObjectHandleShade( guiFace, 0 );
01424 
01425             //Blt face to screen 
01426             BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFaceHandle, 0,FACE_X, FACE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01427 
01428             //if the merc is dead, display it
01429             DrawTextToScreen(AimPopUpText[AIM_MEMBER_DEAD], FACE_X+1, FACE_Y+107, FACE_WIDTH, FONT14ARIAL, 145, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED  );
01430       }
01431 
01432       //else if the merc is currently a POW or, the merc was fired as a pow
01433       else if( gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bMercStatus == MERC_FIRED_AS_A_POW || ( pSoldier &&  pSoldier->bAssignment == ASSIGNMENT_POW ) )
01434       {
01435             ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, FACE_X, FACE_Y, FACE_X + FACE_WIDTH, FACE_Y + FACE_HEIGHT);
01436             DrawTextToScreen( pPOWStrings[0], FACE_X+1, FACE_Y+107, FACE_WIDTH, FONT14ARIAL, 145, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED    );
01437       }
01438       
01439 
01440       //else if the merc has already been hired
01441       else if( FindSoldierByProfileID( gbCurrentSoldier, TRUE ) )
01442       {
01443             ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, FACE_X, FACE_Y, FACE_X + FACE_WIDTH, FACE_Y + FACE_HEIGHT);
01444             DrawTextToScreen( MercInfo[MERC_FILES_ALREADY_HIRED], FACE_X+1, FACE_Y+107, FACE_WIDTH, FONT14ARIAL, 145, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED  );
01445       }
01446 
01447       else if( !IsMercHireable( gbCurrentSoldier ) )
01448       {
01449             //else if the merc has a text file and the merc is not away
01450             ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, FACE_X, FACE_Y, FACE_X + FACE_WIDTH, FACE_Y + FACE_HEIGHT);
01451             DrawTextToScreen(AimPopUpText[AIM_MEMBER_ON_ASSIGNMENT], FACE_X+1, FACE_Y+107, FACE_WIDTH, FONT14ARIAL, 145, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED     );
01452       }
01453 
01454       DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiFace);
01455 
01456       return( TRUE );
01457 }
01458 
01459 
01460 void DisplayMercStats()
01461 {
01462       UINT8 ubColor;
01463 
01464       //
01465       // Display all the static text
01466       //
01467 
01468       //First column in stats box.  Health, Agility, dexterity, strength, leadership, wisdom
01469       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_HEALTH], STATS_FIRST_COL, HEALTH_Y, 0, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01470       DisplayDots(STATS_FIRST_COL, HEALTH_Y, FIRST_COLUMN_DOT, CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_HEALTH]);
01471 
01472       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_AGILITY], STATS_FIRST_COL, AGILITY_Y, 0, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01473       DisplayDots(STATS_FIRST_COL, AGILITY_Y, FIRST_COLUMN_DOT, CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_AGILITY]);
01474 
01475       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_DEXTERITY], STATS_FIRST_COL, DEXTERITY_Y, 0, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01476       DisplayDots(STATS_FIRST_COL, DEXTERITY_Y, FIRST_COLUMN_DOT, CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_DEXTERITY]);
01477 
01478       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_STRENGTH], STATS_FIRST_COL, STRENGTH_Y, 0, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01479       DisplayDots(STATS_FIRST_COL, STRENGTH_Y, FIRST_COLUMN_DOT, CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_STRENGTH]);
01480 
01481       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_LEADERSHIP], STATS_FIRST_COL, LEADERSHIP_Y, 0, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01482       DisplayDots(STATS_FIRST_COL, LEADERSHIP_Y, FIRST_COLUMN_DOT, CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_LEADERSHIP]);
01483 
01484       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_WISDOM], STATS_FIRST_COL, WISDOM_Y, 0, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01485       DisplayDots(STATS_FIRST_COL, WISDOM_Y, FIRST_COLUMN_DOT, CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_WISDOM]);
01486 
01487 
01488       //Second column in stats box.  Exp.Level, Markmanship, mechanical, explosive, medical
01489       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_EXP_LEVEL], STATS_SECOND_COL, EXPLEVEL_Y, 0, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED    );
01490       DisplayDots(STATS_SECOND_COL, EXPLEVEL_Y, SECOND_COLUMN_DOT, CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_EXP_LEVEL]);
01491 
01492       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_MARKSMANSHIP], STATS_SECOND_COL, MARKSMAN_Y, 0, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT , FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01493       DisplayDots(STATS_SECOND_COL, MARKSMAN_Y, SECOND_COLUMN_DOT, CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_MARKSMANSHIP]);
01494 
01495       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_MECHANICAL], STATS_SECOND_COL, MECHANAICAL_Y, 0, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED      );
01496       DisplayDots(STATS_SECOND_COL, MECHANAICAL_Y, SECOND_COLUMN_DOT, CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_MECHANICAL]);
01497 
01498       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_EXPLOSIVE], STATS_SECOND_COL, EXPLOSIVE_Y, 0, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED   );
01499       DisplayDots(STATS_SECOND_COL, EXPLOSIVE_Y, SECOND_COLUMN_DOT, CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_EXPLOSIVE]);
01500 
01501       DrawTextToScreen(CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_MEDICAL], STATS_SECOND_COL, MEDICAL_Y, 0, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED );
01502       DisplayDots(STATS_SECOND_COL, MEDICAL_Y, SECOND_COLUMN_DOT, CharacterInfo[AIM_MEMBER_MEDICAL]);
01503 
01504 
01505       //
01506       // Display all the Merc dynamic stat info
01507       //
01508 
01509       //Name
01510       DrawTextToScreen(gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].zName, NAME_X, NAME_Y, 0, FONT14ARIAL, AIM_M_COLOR_DYNAMIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01511 
01512       // Numbers for above.   Health, Agility, dexterity, strength, leadership, wisdom
01513 
01514       ubColor = GetStatColor( gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bLife );
01515       DrawNumeralsToScreen( gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bLife, 3, STATS_FIRST_NUM, HEALTH_Y, AIM_M_NUMBER_FONT, ubColor   );
01516 
01517       ubColor = GetStatColor( gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bAgility );
01518       DrawNumeralsToScreen(gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bAgility, 3, STATS_FIRST_NUM, AGILITY_Y, AIM_M_NUMBER_FONT, ubColor      );
01519 
01520       ubColor = GetStatColor( gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bDexterity );
01521       DrawNumeralsToScreen(gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bDexterity, 3, STATS_FIRST_NUM, DEXTERITY_Y, AIM_M_NUMBER_FONT, ubColor  );
01522 
01523       ubColor = GetStatColor( gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bStrength );
01524       DrawNumeralsToScreen(gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bStrength, 3, STATS_FIRST_NUM, STRENGTH_Y, AIM_M_NUMBER_FONT, ubColor    );
01525 
01526       ubColor = GetStatColor( gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bLeadership );
01527       DrawNumeralsToScreen(gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bLeadership, 3, STATS_FIRST_NUM, LEADERSHIP_Y, AIM_M_NUMBER_FONT, ubColor      );
01528 
01529       ubColor = GetStatColor( gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bWisdom );
01530       DrawNumeralsToScreen(gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bWisdom, 3, STATS_FIRST_NUM, WISDOM_Y, AIM_M_NUMBER_FONT, ubColor  );
01531 
01532       //Second column in stats box.  Exp.Level, Markmanship, mechanical, explosive, medical
01533 
01534 //    ubColor = GetStatColor( gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bExpLevel );
01535       DrawNumeralsToScreen(gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bExpLevel, 3, STATS_SECOND_NUM, EXPLEVEL_Y, AIM_M_NUMBER_FONT, FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE     );
01536 
01537       ubColor = GetStatColor( gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bMarksmanship );
01538       DrawNumeralsToScreen(gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bMarksmanship, 3, STATS_SECOND_NUM, MARKSMAN_Y, AIM_M_NUMBER_FONT, ubColor     );
01539 
01540       ubColor = GetStatColor( gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bMechanical );
01541       DrawNumeralsToScreen(gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bMechanical, 3, STATS_SECOND_NUM, MECHANAICAL_Y, AIM_M_NUMBER_FONT, ubColor    );
01542 
01543       ubColor = GetStatColor( gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bExplosive );
01544       DrawNumeralsToScreen(gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bExplosive, 3, STATS_SECOND_NUM, EXPLOSIVE_Y, AIM_M_NUMBER_FONT, ubColor );
01545 
01546       ubColor = GetStatColor( gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bMedical );
01547       DrawNumeralsToScreen(gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].bMedical, 3, STATS_SECOND_NUM, MEDICAL_Y, AIM_M_NUMBER_FONT, ubColor     );
01548 }
01549 
01550 UINT8 GetStatColor( INT8 bStat )
01551 {
01552       if( bStat >= 80 )
01553             return( HIGH_STAT_COLOR );
01554       else if( bStat >= 50 )
01555             return( MED_STAT_COLOR );
01556       else
01557             return( LOW_STAT_COLOR );
01558 }
01559 
01560 //displays the dots between the stats and the stat name
01561 void DisplayDots(UINT16 usNameX, UINT16 usNameY, UINT16 usStatX, STR16 pString)
01562 {
01563       INT16 sNumberOfDots;
01564       UINT16 usStringLength = StringPixLength(pString, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT);
01565       INT16  i;
01566       UINT16 usPosX;
01567 
01568       sNumberOfDots = (usStatX - usNameX - usStringLength) / 7;
01569 
01570       usPosX = usStatX;
01571       for(i=usNameX + usStringLength; i <= usPosX; usPosX-=7)
01572       {
01573             DrawTextToScreen(L".", (UINT16)usPosX, usNameY, 0, AIM_M_FONT_STATIC_TEXT, AIM_M_COLOR_STATIC_TEXT, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01574       }
01575 }
01576 
01577 
01578 void BtnContractLengthButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01579 {
01580       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
01581             return;
01582 
01583       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01584       {
01585             UINT8 ubRetValue = (UINT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
01586 
01587             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01588 
01589             gubContractLength = ubRetValue;
01590             DisplaySelectLights(TRUE, FALSE);
01591             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01592       }
01593       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01594       {
01595             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01596 
01597             DisplaySelectLights(FALSE, FALSE);
01598 
01599             guiMercAttitudeTime = GetJA2Clock();
01600 
01601             DisplayMercChargeAmount();
01602             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01603 
01604 //          InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01605       }
01606       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
01607       {
01608             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01609             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01610       }
01611 }

01614 void BtnBuyEquipmentButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)

01623             DisplaySelectLights(FALSE, TRUE);
01624 
01625             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01626       }
01627       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01628       {
01629             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01630             DisplaySelectLights(FALSE, FALSE);
01631             DisplayMercChargeAmount();
01632 
01633             guiMercAttitudeTime = GetJA2Clock();
01634 
01635 //          InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
01636 
01637             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01638       }
01639       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
01640       {
01641             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01642             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01643       }
01644 }

01646 //Transfer funds button callback
01647 void BtnAuthorizeButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
01648 {
01649       if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
01650             return;
01651 
01652       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
01653       {
01654             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
01655             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01656       }
01657       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
01658       {
01659             UINT8 ubRetValue = (UINT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
01660             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01661 
01662             gfStopMercFromTalking = TRUE;
01663             gubMercAttitudeLevel = QUOTE_DELAY_NO_ACTION;
01664 
01665             //If we try to hire the merc
01666             if( ubRetValue == 0)
01667             {
01668                   StopMercTalking();
01669 
01670                   //can the merc be hired?  (does he like/not like people on the team
01671 //                if( CanMercBeHired() )
01672                   {
01673                         //Was the merc hired
01674                         if( AimMemberHireMerc() )
01675                         {
01676                               // if merc was hired
01677                               InitCreateDeleteAimPopUpBox(AIM_POPUP_CREATE, AimPopUpText[AIM_MEMBER_FUNDS_TRANSFER_SUCCESFUL], NULL, AIM_POPUP_BOX_X, AIM_POPUP_BOX_Y, AIM_POPUP_BOX_SUCCESS);
01678                               DelayMercSpeech( gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_CONTRACT_ACCEPTANCE, 750, TRUE, FALSE );
01679 
01680                               //Disable the buttons behind the message box
01681                               EnableDisableCurrentVideoConferenceButtons( TRUE );
01682 
01683                               SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( giBuyEquipmentButton[0], DISABLED_STYLE_NONE );
01684                               SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( giBuyEquipmentButton[1], DISABLED_STYLE_NONE );
01685 
01686                               giIdOfLastHiredMerc = AimMercArray[gbCurrentIndex];
01687                         }
01688                   }
01689 /*
01690                   else
01691                   {
01692                         //else the merc doesnt like a player on the team, hang up when the merc is done complaining
01693 
01694                         //reset ( in case merc was going to say something
01695                         DelayMercSpeech( 0, 0, 0, FALSE, TRUE );
01696 
01697                         gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_HIRE_MERC_MODE;
01698                   }
01699 */
01700             }
01701             // else we cancel
01702             else
01703             {
01704                   gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_FIRST_CONTACT_MERC_MODE;
01705             }
01706             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01707       }
01708       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
01709       {
01710             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
01711             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
01712       }
01713 }
