01715 
01716 
01717 INT8 AimMemberHireMerc()
01718 {
01719       MERC_HIRE_STRUCT HireMercStruct;
01720       UINT8       ubCurrentSoldier = AimMercArray[gbCurrentIndex];
01721       INT8        bReturnCode;
01722       INT16       sSoldierID=0;
01723       INT8        bTypeOfContract=0;
01724 
01725 
01726       if( LaptopSaveInfo.iCurrentBalance < giContractAmount )
01727       {
01728             //wasnt hired because of lack of funds
01729             InitCreateDeleteAimPopUpBox(AIM_POPUP_CREATE, AimPopUpText[AIM_MEMBER_FUNDS_TRANSFER_FAILED], AimPopUpText[AIM_MEMBER_NOT_ENOUGH_FUNDS], AIM_POPUP_BOX_X, AIM_POPUP_BOX_Y, AIM_POPUP_BOX_FAILURE);
01730 
01731             //Disable the buttons behind the message box
01732             EnableDisableCurrentVideoConferenceButtons( TRUE );
01733 
01734             SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( giBuyEquipmentButton[0], DISABLED_STYLE_NONE );
01735             SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( giBuyEquipmentButton[1], DISABLED_STYLE_NONE );
01736 
01737             DelayMercSpeech( gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_REFUSAL_TO_JOIN_LACK_OF_FUNDS, 750, TRUE, FALSE );
01738 
01739             return(FALSE);
01740       }
01741 
01742       memset(&HireMercStruct, 0, sizeof(MERC_HIRE_STRUCT));
01743 
01744       HireMercStruct.ubProfileID = ubCurrentSoldier;
01745 
01746       //DEF: temp
01747       HireMercStruct.sSectorX = gsMercArriveSectorX;
01748       HireMercStruct.sSectorY = gsMercArriveSectorY;
01749       HireMercStruct.fUseLandingZoneForArrival = TRUE;
01750       HireMercStruct.ubInsertionCode      = INSERTION_CODE_ARRIVING_GAME;
01751 
01752       HireMercStruct.fCopyProfileItemsOver = gfBuyEquipment;
01753       //if the players is buyibng the equipment
01754       if( gfBuyEquipment )
01755       {
01756             gMercProfiles[ ubCurrentSoldier ].ubMiscFlags |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_ALREADY_USED_ITEMS;
01757       }
01758 
01759             //If 1 day
01760       if( gubContractLength == AIM_CONTRACT_LENGTH_ONE_DAY)
01761       {
01762             bTypeOfContract = CONTRACT_EXTEND_1_DAY;
01763             HireMercStruct.iTotalContractLength = 1;
01764       }
01765       else if( gubContractLength == AIM_CONTRACT_LENGTH_ONE_WEEK)
01766       {
01767             bTypeOfContract = CONTRACT_EXTEND_1_WEEK;
01768             HireMercStruct.iTotalContractLength = 7;
01769       }
01770       else if( gubContractLength == AIM_CONTRACT_LENGTH_TWO_WEEKS)
01771       {
01772             bTypeOfContract = CONTRACT_EXTEND_2_WEEK;
01773             HireMercStruct.iTotalContractLength = 14;
01774       }
01775 
01776       //specify when the merc should arrive
01777       HireMercStruct.uiTimeTillMercArrives = GetMercArrivalTimeOfDay( );// + ubCurrentSoldier
01778 
01779       //Set the time and ID of the last hired merc will arrive
01780 //    LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.iIdOfMerc = HireMercStruct.ubProfileID;
01781 //    LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.uiArrivalTime = HireMercStruct.uiTimeTillMercArrives;
01782 
01783       //if we succesfully hired the merc
01784       bReturnCode = HireMerc( &HireMercStruct );
01785       if( bReturnCode == MERC_HIRE_OVER_20_MERCS_HIRED )
01786       {
01787             //display a warning saying u cant hire more then 20 mercs
01788             DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_LAPTOP_DEFAULT, AimPopUpText[ AIM_MEMBER_ALREADY_HAVE_20_MERCS ], LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
01789             return(FALSE);
01790       }
01791       else if( bReturnCode == MERC_HIRE_FAILED )
01792       {
01793             return(FALSE);
01794       }
01795 
01796       //Set the type of contract the merc is on
01797       sSoldierID = GetSoldierIDFromMercID( ubCurrentSoldier );
01798       if( sSoldierID == -1 )
01799             return( FALSE );
01800       Menptr[ sSoldierID ].bTypeOfLastContract = bTypeOfContract;
01801 
01802       
01803       //add an entry in the finacial page for the hiring of the merc
01804       AddTransactionToPlayersBook(HIRED_MERC, ubCurrentSoldier, GetWorldTotalMin(), -( giContractAmount - gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].sMedicalDepositAmount ) );
01805       
01806       if( gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bMedicalDeposit )
01807       {
01808             //add an entry in the finacial page for the medical deposit
01809             AddTransactionToPlayersBook(  MEDICAL_DEPOSIT, ubCurrentSoldier, GetWorldTotalMin(), -(gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].sMedicalDepositAmount) );
01810       }
01811 
01812       //add an entry in the history page for the hiring of the merc
01813       AddHistoryToPlayersLog(HISTORY_HIRED_MERC_FROM_AIM, ubCurrentSoldier, GetWorldTotalMin(), -1, -1 );
01814       return(TRUE);
01815 }
01816 
01817 
01818 
01819 BOOLEAN DisplayVideoConferencingDisplay()
01820 {
01821       wchar_t           sMercName[128];
01822 
01823       if( ( gubVideoConferencingMode == AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE ) || ( gubVideoConferencingMode == AIM_VIDEO_POPUP_MODE ) )
01824             return(FALSE);
01825 
01826       DisplayMercsVideoFace();
01827 
01828       //Title & Name
01829       if( gubVideoConferencingMode == AIM_VIDEO_INIT_MODE)
01830       {
01831             swprintf( sMercName, L"%s",  VideoConfercingText[AIM_MEMBER_CONNECTING]);
01832             DrawTextToScreen(sMercName, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_NAME_X, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_NAME_Y, 0, FONT12ARIAL, AIM_M_VIDEO_TITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01833       }
01834       else
01835       {
01836             swprintf( sMercName, L"%s %s",  VideoConfercingText[AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_CONF_WITH], gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].zName);
01837             DrawTextToScreen(sMercName, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_NAME_X, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_NAME_Y, 0, FONT12ARIAL, AIM_M_VIDEO_TITLE_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01838       }
01839 
01840       //Display Contract charge text
01841       if( gubVideoConferencingMode == AIM_VIDEO_HIRE_MERC_MODE )
01842       {
01843             // Display the contract charge
01844             SetFontShadow(AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR);    
01845             DrawTextToScreen(VideoConfercingText[AIM_MEMBER_CONTRACT_CHARGE], AIM_CONTRACT_CHARGE_X, AIM_CONTRACT_CHARGE_Y, 0, FONT12ARIAL, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
01846             SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
01847       }
01848 
01849       DisplayMercChargeAmount();
01850 
01851 //    if( gfMercIsTalking && !gfIsAnsweringMachineActive)
01852       if( gfMercIsTalking && gGameSettings.fOptions[ TOPTION_SUBTITLES ] )
01853       {
01854             UINT16 usActualWidth;
01855             UINT16 usActualHeight;
01856             UINT16 usPosX;
01857 
01858     SET_USE_WINFONTS( TRUE );
01859     SET_WINFONT( giSubTitleWinFont ); 
01860 
01861       iAimMembersBoxId = PrepareMercPopupBox( iAimMembersBoxId ,BASIC_MERC_POPUP_BACKGROUND, BASIC_MERC_POPUP_BORDER, gsTalkingMercText, 300, 0, 0, 0, &usActualWidth, &usActualHeight);
01862 
01863     SET_USE_WINFONTS( FALSE );
01864 
01865             usPosX = iScreenWidthOffset + ( 613 - usActualWidth ) / 2 ;
01866 
01867             RenderMercPopUpBoxFromIndex( iAimMembersBoxId, usPosX, TEXT_POPUP_WINDOW_Y, FRAME_BUFFER);
01868             
01869             if( RemoveMercPopupBoxFromIndex( iAimMembersBoxId ) )
01870             {
01871                   iAimMembersBoxId = -1;
01872             }
01873       }
01874 
01875   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
01876 
01877       return(TRUE);
01878 }
01879 
01880 BOOLEAN DisplayMercsVideoFace()
01881 {
01882   HVOBJECT  hTerminalHandle;
01883       STR                     sFaceLoc = "FACES\\";
01884 
01885       // Get and Blt Terminal Frame
01886       GetVideoObject(&hTerminalHandle, guiVideoConfTerminal);
01887       ShadowVideoSurfaceImage( FRAME_BUFFER, hTerminalHandle, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_CONF_TERMINAL_X, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_CONF_TERMINAL_Y);
01888   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hTerminalHandle, 0,AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_CONF_TERMINAL_X, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_CONF_TERMINAL_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01889 
01890 
01891       //Display the Select light on the merc
01892       if(gubVideoConferencingMode == AIM_VIDEO_HIRE_MERC_MODE)
01893             DisplaySelectLights(FALSE, FALSE);
01894 
01895       return(TRUE);
01896 }
01897 
01898 void DisplaySelectLights(BOOLEAN fContractDown, BOOLEAN fBuyEquipDown)
01899 {
01900       UINT16 i, usPosY, usPosX;
01901 
01902       //First draw the select light for the contract length buttons
01903       usPosY = AIM_MEMBER_BUY_CONTRACT_LENGTH_Y;
01904       for(i=0; i<3; i++)
01905       {
01906             // if the if is true, the light is on
01907             if( gubContractLength == i)
01908             {
01909                   if( fContractDown)
01910                   {
01911                         usPosX = AIM_MEMBER_BUY_CONTRACT_LENGTH_X + AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_ON_X;
01912                         ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, usPosX, usPosY+AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_ON_Y, usPosX+8,  usPosY+AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_ON_Y+8, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 255, 0 ) ) );
01913                   }
01914                   else
01915                   {
01916                         usPosX = AIM_MEMBER_BUY_CONTRACT_LENGTH_X + AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_OFF_X;
01917                         ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, usPosX, usPosY+AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_OFF_Y, usPosX+8, usPosY+AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_OFF_Y+8, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 255, 0 ) ) );
01918                   }
01919             }
01920             else
01921             {
01922                   usPosX = AIM_MEMBER_BUY_CONTRACT_LENGTH_X + AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_OFF_X;
01923                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, usPosX, usPosY+AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_OFF_Y, usPosX+8, usPosY+AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_OFF_Y+8, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
01924             }
01925             usPosY += AIM_MEMBER_BUY_EQUIPMENT_GAP;
01926       }
01927 
01928       //draw the select light for the buy equipment buttons
01929       usPosY = AIM_MEMBER_BUY_CONTRACT_LENGTH_Y;
01930       for(i=0; i<2; i++)
01931       {
01932             if( gfBuyEquipment == i)
01933             {
01934                   if( fBuyEquipDown)
01935                   {
01936                         usPosX = AIM_MEMBER_BUY_EQUIPMENT_X + AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_ON_X;
01937                         ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, usPosX, usPosY+AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_ON_Y, usPosX+8,  usPosY+AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_ON_Y+8, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 255, 0 ) ) );
01938                   }
01939                   else
01940                   {
01941                         usPosX = AIM_MEMBER_BUY_EQUIPMENT_X + AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_OFF_X;
01942                         ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, usPosX, usPosY+AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_OFF_Y, usPosX+8, usPosY+AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_OFF_Y+8, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 255, 0 ) ) );
01943                   }
01944             }
01945             else
01946             {
01947                   usPosX = AIM_MEMBER_BUY_EQUIPMENT_X + AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_OFF_X;
01948                   ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, usPosX, usPosY+AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_OFF_Y, usPosX+8, usPosY+AIM_SELECT_LIGHT_OFF_Y+8, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
01949             }
01950             usPosY += AIM_MEMBER_BUY_EQUIPMENT_GAP;
01951       }
01952   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
01953 }
01954 
01955 
01956 UINT32 DisplayMercChargeAmount()
01957 {
01958       wchar_t           wTemp[50];
01959       wchar_t           wDollarTemp[50];
01960       HVOBJECT hImageHandle;
01961 
01962 
01963       if( gubVideoConferencingMode != AIM_VIDEO_HIRE_MERC_MODE )
01964             return(0);
01965 
01966       // Display the 'black hole'for the contract charge  in the video conference terminal
01967       GetVideoObject(&hImageHandle, guiVideoContractCharge);
01968       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hImageHandle, 0,AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_CONF_CONTRACT_IMAGE_X, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_CONF_CONTRACT_IMAGE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
01969 
01970       
01971       if( FindSoldierByProfileID( gbCurrentSoldier, TRUE ) == NULL )
01972       {
01973             giContractAmount = 0;
01974 
01975             //the contract charge amount
01976 
01977             // Get the salary rate
01978             if( gubContractLength == AIM_CONTRACT_LENGTH_ONE_DAY)
01979                   giContractAmount = gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].sSalary;
01980 
01981             else if( gubContractLength == AIM_CONTRACT_LENGTH_ONE_WEEK)
01982                   giContractAmount = gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].uiWeeklySalary;
01983 
01984             else if( gubContractLength == AIM_CONTRACT_LENGTH_TWO_WEEKS)
01985                   giContractAmount = gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].uiBiWeeklySalary;
01986 
01987             // if there is a medical deposit, add it in
01988             if( gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bMedicalDeposit )
01989             {
01990                   giContractAmount += gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].sMedicalDepositAmount;
01991             }
01992 
01993             //If hired with the equipment, add it in aswell
01994             if( gfBuyEquipment )
01995             {
01996                   giContractAmount += gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].usOptionalGearCost;
01997             }
01998       }
01999 
02000       
02001   swprintf( wDollarTemp, L"%d", giContractAmount);
02002       InsertCommasForDollarFigure( wDollarTemp );
02003       InsertDollarSignInToString( wDollarTemp );
02004 
02005       //if the merc hasnt just been hired 
02006 //    if( FindSoldierByProfileID( gbCurrentSoldier, TRUE ) == NULL )
02007       {
02008             if( gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bMedicalDeposit )
02009                   swprintf(wTemp, L"%s %s", wDollarTemp, VideoConfercingText[AIM_MEMBER_WITH_MEDICAL] );
02010             else
02011                   swprintf(wTemp, L"%s", wDollarTemp );
02012 
02013             DrawTextToScreen(wTemp, AIM_CONTRACT_CHARGE_AMOUNNT_X+1, AIM_CONTRACT_CHARGE_AMOUNNT_Y+3, 0, AIM_M_VIDEO_CONTRACT_AMOUNT_FONT, AIM_M_VIDEO_CONTRACT_AMOUNT_COLOR, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, LEFT_JUSTIFIED);
02014       }
02015 
02016       return(giContractAmount);
02017 }
02018 
02019 BOOLEAN InitCreateDeleteAimPopUpBox(UINT8 ubFlag, STR16 sString1, STR16 sString2, UINT16 usPosX, UINT16 usPosY, UINT8 ubData)
02020 {
02021   VOBJECT_DESC  VObjectDesc;
02022   HVOBJECT              hPopupBoxHandle;
02023       static UINT16                       usPopUpBoxPosX, usPopUpBoxPosY;
02024       static wchar_t                      sPopUpString1[400], sPopUpString2[400];
02025       static BOOLEAN          fPopUpBoxActive = FALSE;;
02026 
02027       switch( ubFlag )
02028       {
02029             case AIM_POPUP_CREATE:
02030             {
02031                   if( fPopUpBoxActive )
02032                         return(FALSE);
02033 
02034                   //Disable the 'X' to close the pop upi video
02035                   DisableButton( giXToCloseVideoConfButton );
02036 
02037                   if(sString1 != NULL)
02038                         wcscpy(sPopUpString1, sString1);
02039                   else
02040                         sPopUpString1[0] = L'\0';
02041 
02042                   if(sString2 != NULL)
02043                         wcscpy(sPopUpString2, sString2);
02044                   else
02045                         sPopUpString2[0] = L'\0';
02046 
02047                   usPopUpBoxPosX = usPosX;
02048                   usPopUpBoxPosY = usPosY;
02049 
02050                   // load the popup box graphic
02051                   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
02052                   FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\VideoConfPopUp.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
02053                   CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiPopUpBox));
02054 
02055                   GetVideoObject(&hPopupBoxHandle, guiPopUpBox);
02056                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPopupBoxHandle, 0,usPosX, usPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
02057 
02058                   //Create the popup boxes button
02059                   guiPopUpImage = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\VideoConfButtons.sti", -1,2,-1,3,-1 );
02060                   guiPopUpOkButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiPopUpImage, VideoConfercingText[AIM_MEMBER_OK],
02061                                                                                            FONT14ARIAL, 
02062                                                                                            AIM_POPUP_BOX_COLOR, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR, 
02063                                                                                            AIM_POPUP_BOX_COLOR, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR, 
02064                                                                                            TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
02065                                                                                            (UINT16)(usPosX+AIM_POPUP_BOX_BUTTON_OFFSET_X), (UINT16)(usPosY+AIM_POPUP_BOX_BUTTON_OFFSET_Y), BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH+5,
02066                                                                                            DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnPopUpOkButtonCallback);
02067                   SetButtonCursor(guiPopUpOkButton, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
02068                   MSYS_SetBtnUserData( guiPopUpOkButton, 0, ubData);
02069 
02070                   fPopUpBoxActive = TRUE;
02071                   gubPopUpBoxAction = AIM_POPUP_DISPLAY;
02072 
02073 
02074                   // Disable the current video conference buttons
02075                   //EnableDisableCurrentVideoConferenceButtons(TRUE);
02076                   if( gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode == AIM_VIDEO_HIRE_MERC_MODE )
02077                   {
02078                         // Enable the current video conference buttons
02079                         EnableDisableCurrentVideoConferenceButtons(FALSE);
02080                   }
02081 
02082 
02083 
02084 //
02085 //    Create a new flag for the PostButtonRendering function
02086 //
02087                   fReDrawPostButtonRender = TRUE;
02088             }
02089             break;
02090 
02091             case AIM_POPUP_DISPLAY:
02092             {
02093                   HVOBJECT                hPopupBoxHandle;
02094                   UINT16                        usTempPosY = usPopUpBoxPosY;
02095 
02096                   if( gubPopUpBoxAction != AIM_POPUP_DISPLAY)
02097                         return(FALSE);
02098 
02099                   // load and display the popup box graphic
02100                   GetVideoObject(&hPopupBoxHandle, guiPopUpBox);
02101                   BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hPopupBoxHandle, 0,usPopUpBoxPosX, usPopUpBoxPosY, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
02102 
02103                   SetFontShadow(AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR);    
02104 
02105                   usTempPosY += AIM_POPUP_BOX_STRING1_Y;
02106                   if( sPopUpString1[0]  != L'\0')
02107                         usTempPosY += DisplayWrappedString(usPopUpBoxPosX, usTempPosY, AIM_POPUP_BOX_WIDTH, 2, AIM_POPUP_BOX_FONT, AIM_POPUP_BOX_COLOR,  sPopUpString1, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
02108                   if( sPopUpString2[0] != L'\0')
02109                         DisplayWrappedString(usPopUpBoxPosX, (UINT16)(usTempPosY+4), AIM_POPUP_BOX_WIDTH, 2, AIM_POPUP_BOX_FONT, AIM_POPUP_BOX_COLOR,  sPopUpString2, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED);
02110 
02111                   SetFontShadow(DEFAULT_SHADOW);
02112 
02113                   InvalidateRegion(LAPTOP_SCREEN_UL_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_UL_Y,LAPTOP_SCREEN_LR_X,LAPTOP_SCREEN_WEB_LR_Y);
02114 
02115             }
02116             break;
02117 
02118             case AIM_POPUP_DELETE:
02119             {
02120                   if( !fPopUpBoxActive )
02121                         return(FALSE);
02122 
02123                   //Disable the 'X' to close the pop upi video
02124                   EnableButton( giXToCloseVideoConfButton );
02125 
02126                   UnloadButtonImage( guiPopUpImage );
02127                   RemoveButton( guiPopUpOkButton );
02128                   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex( guiPopUpBox );
02129 
02130                   fPopUpBoxActive = FALSE;
02131                   gubPopUpBoxAction = AIM_POPUP_NOTHING;
02132 
02133                   if( gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode == AIM_VIDEO_HIRE_MERC_MODE )
02134                   {
02135                         // Enable the current video conference buttons
02136                         EnableDisableCurrentVideoConferenceButtons(FALSE);
02137                   }
02138                   else if( gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode == AIM_VIDEO_MERC_ANSWERING_MACHINE_MODE )
02139                   {
02140                         EnableButton( giAnsweringMachineButton[1]);
02141                   }
02142             }
02143             break;
02144       }
02145 
02146       return(TRUE);
02147 }
02148 
02149 
02150 void BtnPopUpOkButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02151 {
02152       static BOOLEAN fInCallback=TRUE;
02153 
02154       if( fInCallback )
02155       {
02156             if (!(btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_ENABLED))
02157                   return;
02158 
02159             if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02160             {
02161                   btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02162                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02163             }
02164             if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02165             {
02166                   UINT8 ubCurPageNum = (UINT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
02167 
02168                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02169                   fInCallback = FALSE;
02170 
02171 //                gfStopMercFromTalking = TRUE;
02172                   
02173                   gubPopUpBoxAction = AIM_POPUP_DELETE; 
02174 
02175                   if( gubVideoConferencingMode != AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE )
02176                   {
02177                         if( ubCurPageNum == AIM_POPUP_BOX_SUCCESS)                  
02178                         {
02179                               gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_HIRE_MERC_MODE;
02180                               WaitForMercToFinishTalkingOrUserToClick();
02181                         }
02182                               //                      gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_POPDOWN_MODE;
02183                         else
02184                               gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_HIRE_MERC_MODE;
02185                   }
02186 
02187                   fInCallback = TRUE;
02188 
02189                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02190             }
02191       }
02192 } 
02193 
02194 // we first contact merc.  We either go to hire him or cancel the call
02195 void BtnFirstContactButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02196 {
02197       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02198       {
02199             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02200             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02201       }
02202       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02203       {
02204             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
02205             {
02206                   UINT8 ubRetValue = (UINT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
02207       
02208 //                gfStopMercFromTalking = TRUE;
02209                   StopMercTalking();
02210 
02211                   gfAimMemberCanMercSayOpeningQuote = FALSE;
02212 
02213                   if( ubRetValue == 0)
02214                   {
02215                         if( CanMercBeHired() )
02216                         {
02217                               gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_HIRE_MERC_MODE;
02218                         }
02219                   }
02220                   else
02221                   {
02222                         gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_POPDOWN_MODE;
02223                   }
02224 
02225                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02226 
02227             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02228             }
02229       }
02230       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
02231       {
02232             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02233             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02234       }
02235 } 
02236 
02237 
02238 void BtnAnsweringMachineButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02239 {
02240       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02241       {
02242             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02243             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02244       }
02245       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02246       {
02247             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
02248             {
02249                   UINT8 ubRetValue = (UINT8)MSYS_GetBtnUserData( btn, 0 );
02250       
02251                   if( ubRetValue == 0)
02252                   {
02253                         //Set a flag indicating that the merc has a message
02254                         gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].ubMiscFlags3 |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG3_PLAYER_LEFT_MSG_FOR_MERC_AT_AIM;
02255                         WaitForMercToFinishTalkingOrUserToClick();
02256 
02257                         //Display a message box displaying a messsage that the message was recorded
02258 //                      DoLapTopMessageBox( 10, AimPopUpText[ AIM_MEMBER_MESSAGE_RECORDED ], LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL );
02259                         InitCreateDeleteAimPopUpBox( AIM_POPUP_CREATE, L" ", AimPopUpText[ AIM_MEMBER_MESSAGE_RECORDED ], AIM_POPUP_BOX_X, AIM_POPUP_BOX_Y, AIM_POPUP_BOX_SUCCESS );
02260 
02261 
02262                         SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( giAnsweringMachineButton[1], DISABLED_STYLE_NONE );
02263                         DisableButton( giAnsweringMachineButton[1]);
02264                         DisableButton( giAnsweringMachineButton[0] );
02265                   }
02266                   else
02267                   {
02268                         gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_POPDOWN_MODE;
02269 //                      gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE;
02270                   }
02271 
02272                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02273                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02274             }
02275       }
02276       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
02277       {
02278             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02279             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
02280       }
02281 }

02284 void BtnHangUpButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
02285 {
02286       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
02287       {
02288             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
02289             InvalidateRegion(CONTACT_X,CONTACT_BOX_Y,CONTACT_BR_X,CONTACT_BR_Y);
02290       }
02291       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
02292       {
02293             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
02294             {
02295 //                gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE;
02296                   gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_POPDOWN_MODE;
02297 
02298                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02299 
02300                   InvalidateRegion(CONTACT_X,CONTACT_BOX_Y,CONTACT_BR_X,CONTACT_BR_Y);
02301             }
02302       }
02303       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LOST_MOUSE)
02304       {
02305             btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
02306             InvalidateRegion(CONTACT_X,CONTACT_BOX_Y,CONTACT_BR_X,CONTACT_BR_Y);
02307       }

02310 // InitVideoFace() is called once to initialize things
02311 BOOLEAN  InitVideoFace(UINT8 ubMercID)
02312 {
02313       //Create the facial index
02314       giMercFaceIndex = InitFace( ubMercID, NOBODY, 0 );
02315 
02316       SetAutoFaceActive( guiVideoFaceBackground, FACE_AUTO_RESTORE_BUFFER , giMercFaceIndex, 0, 0);
02317 
02318       RenderAutoFace( giMercFaceIndex );
02319 
02320       gubCurrentStaticMode = VC_NO_STATIC;
02321 
02322       gfVideoFaceActive = TRUE;
02323 
02324       guiMercAttitudeTime = GetJA2Clock();
02325 
02326       return(TRUE);
02327 }
02328 
02329 
02330 // InitVideoFaceTalking() is called to start a merc speaking a particular message
02331 BOOLEAN  InitVideoFaceTalking(UINT8 ubMercID, UINT16 usQuoteNum)
02332 {
02333 
02334       //Starts the merc talking
02335       if(!CharacterDialogue( ubMercID, usQuoteNum, giMercFaceIndex, DIALOGUE_CONTACTPAGE_UI, FALSE , FALSE) )
02336       {
02337             return(FALSE);
02338       }
02339 
02340       //Enables it so if a player clicks, he will shutup the merc
02341       MSYS_EnableRegion(&gSelectedShutUpMercRegion); 
02342 
02343       gfIsShutUpMouseRegionActive = TRUE;
02344       gfMercIsTalking = TRUE;
02345       guiTimeThatMercStartedTalking = GetJA2Clock();
02346       return(TRUE);
02347 }
02348 
02349 
02350 BOOLEAN DisplayTalkingMercFaceForVideoPopUp(INT32     iFaceIndex)
02351 {
02352       static BOOLEAN fWasTheMercTalking=FALSE;
02353       BOOLEAN           fIsTheMercTalking;
02354       SGPRect           SrcRect;
02355       SGPRect           DestRect;
02356 
02357 
02358       //Test
02359       SrcRect.iLeft = 0;
02360       SrcRect.iTop = 0;
02361       SrcRect.iRight = 48;
02362       SrcRect.iBottom = 43;
02363 
02364       DestRect.iLeft = AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X;
02365       DestRect.iTop = AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y;
02366       DestRect.iRight = DestRect.iLeft + AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_WIDTH;
02367       DestRect.iBottom = DestRect.iTop + AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_HEIGHT;
02368 
02369 
02370 
02371       //If the answering machine graphics is up, dont handle the faces
02372       if( gfIsAnsweringMachineActive )
02373       {
02374             gFacesData[ giMercFaceIndex ].fInvalidAnim = TRUE;
02375       }
02376 
02377       HandleDialogue();
02378       HandleAutoFaces( );
02379       HandleTalkingAutoFaces( );
02380 
02381       //If the answering machine is up, dont display the face
02382 //    if( !gfIsAnsweringMachineActive )
02383       {
02384             //Blt the face surface to the video background surface
02385             if(   !BltStretchVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER, guiVideoFaceBackground, 0, 0, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, &SrcRect, &DestRect ) )
02386                   return(FALSE);
02387 
02388             //if the merc is not at home and the players is leaving a message, shade the players face
02389             if( gfIsAnsweringMachineActive )
02390                   ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, DestRect.iLeft, DestRect.iTop, DestRect.iRight-1, DestRect.iBottom-1 );
02391 
02392 
02393             //If the answering machine graphics is up, place a message on the screen
02394             if( gfIsAnsweringMachineActive )
02395             {
02396                   //display a message over the mercs face
02397                   DisplayWrappedString( AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y+20, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_WIDTH, 2, FONT14ARIAL, 145,  AimPopUpText[ AIM_MEMBER_PRERECORDED_MESSAGE ], FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );
02398             }
02399 
02400 
02401             InvalidateRegion(AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X,AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X+AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_WIDTH,AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y+AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_HEIGHT);
02402       }
02403 
02404       fIsTheMercTalking = gFacesData[iFaceIndex].fTalking;
02405 
02406       //if the merc is talking, reset their attitude time
02407       if( fIsTheMercTalking )
02408       {
02409             //def added 3/18/99
02410             guiMercAttitudeTime = GetJA2Clock();
02411       }
02412 
02413       //if the text the merc is saying is really short, extend the time that it is on the screen
02414       if( ( GetJA2Clock() - guiTimeThatMercStartedTalking ) > usAimMercSpeechDuration )
02415       {
02416             //if the merc just stopped talking
02417             if(fWasTheMercTalking && !fIsTheMercTalking )
02418             {
02419                   fWasTheMercTalking = FALSE;
02420 
02421                   gfRedrawScreen = TRUE;
02422                   guiMercAttitudeTime = GetJA2Clock();
02423 
02424                   StopMercTalking();
02425             }
02426       }
02427       else if( fIsTheMercTalking )
02428       {
02429             fWasTheMercTalking = fIsTheMercTalking;
02430       }
02431 
02432       return(fIsTheMercTalking);
02433 }
02434 
02435 void DisplayTextForMercFaceVideoPopUp(INT16 * pString)
02436 {
02437 
02438 #ifdef TAIWANESE
02439       swprintf( gsTalkingMercText, L"%s", pString );
02440 #else
02441       swprintf( gsTalkingMercText, L"\"%s\"", pString );
02442 #endif
02443       
02444       //Set the minimum time for the dialogue text to be present
02445       usAimMercSpeechDuration =  wcslen( gsTalkingMercText ) * AIM_TEXT_SPEECH_MODIFIER;
02446 
02447       if( usAimMercSpeechDuration < MINIMUM_TALKING_TIME_FOR_MERC )
02448             usAimMercSpeechDuration = MINIMUM_TALKING_TIME_FOR_MERC;
02449 
02450 
02451       gfRedrawScreen = TRUE;
02452 }
