02455 
02456 void SelectShutUpMercRegionCallBack(MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
02457 { 
02458       BOOLEAN fInCallBack=TRUE;
02459 
02460       if(fInCallBack)
02461       {
02462             if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_INIT)
02463             {
02464             }
02465             else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_RBUTTON_UP)
02466             {
02467                   gfStopMercFromTalking = TRUE;
02468             } 
02469             else if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
02470             {
02471                   fInCallBack = FALSE;
02472 
02473                   gfStopMercFromTalking = TRUE;
02474                   fInCallBack = TRUE;
02475             } 
02476       }
02477 }
02478 
02479 
02480 UINT8 WillMercAcceptCall()
02481 {
02482       //if merc has hung up on the player twice within a period of time (MERC_ANNOYED_WONT_CONTACT_TIME_MINUTES )the merc cant ber hired
02483       if( gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bMercStatus == MERC_ANNOYED_WONT_CONTACT )
02484       {
02485             return(AIM_VIDEO_MERC_UNAVAILABLE_MODE);
02486       }
02487 
02488       //if the merc is currently on contract, the answering machine will pick up.
02489       if( (gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bMercStatus > 0 ) || (gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bMercStatus == MERC_HAS_NO_TEXT_FILE  ) || (gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bMercStatus == MERC_HIRED_BUT_NOT_ARRIVED_YET  ) )
02490       {
02491             return(AIM_VIDEO_MERC_ANSWERING_MACHINE_MODE);
02492       }
02493 
02494       // if the merc is at home, or if the merc is only slightly annoyed at the player,  he will greet the player
02495       if( IsMercHireable( gbCurrentSoldier ) )
02496       {
02497             return(AIM_VIDEO_FIRST_CONTACT_MERC_MODE);
02498       }
02499       else
02500             return(AIM_VIDEO_MERC_ANSWERING_MACHINE_MODE);
02501 }
02502 
02503 
02504 
02505 BOOLEAN CanMercBeHired()
02506 {
02507       UINT8 i,j;
02508       INT8  bMercID;
02509       BOOLEAN fRetVal = FALSE;
02510       BOOLEAN     fBuddyOnTeam=FALSE;
02511 
02512 
02513 
02514       StopMercTalking();
02515 
02516       // if the merc recently came back with poor morale, and hasn't gotten over it yet
02517       if (gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].ubDaysOfMoraleHangover > 0)
02518       {
02519             // then he refuses with a lame excuse.  Buddy or no buddy.
02520             WaitForMercToFinishTalkingOrUserToClick();
02521             InitVideoFaceTalking( gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_LAME_REFUSAL );
02522             return( FALSE );
02523       }
02524 
02525 
02526       // loop through the list of people the merc hates
02527       for(i=0; i< NUMBER_HATED_MERCS_ONTEAM; i++)
02528       {
02529             //see if someone the merc hates is on the team
02530             bMercID = gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bHated[i];
02531 
02532             if( bMercID < 0 )
02533                   continue;
02534 
02535             //if the hated merc is dead
02536             if( IsMercDead( bMercID ) )
02537             {
02538                   //ignore the merc
02539                   continue;
02540             }
02541 
02542             if( IsMercOnTeamAndInOmertaAlready( bMercID ) )
02543             {
02544                   //if the merc hates someone on the team, see if a buddy is on the team
02545                   for(j=0; j< NUMBER_HATED_MERCS_ONTEAM; j++)
02546                   {
02547                         //if a buddy is on the team, the merc will join
02548                         bMercID = gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bBuddy[j];
02549 
02550                         if( bMercID < 0 )
02551                               continue;  
02552 
02553                         if( IsMercOnTeam( bMercID ) && !IsMercDead( bMercID ) )
02554                         {
02555                               if(j == 0 )
02556                               {
02557                                     InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_JOINING_CAUSE_BUDDY_1_ON_TEAM);
02558                               }
02559                               else if(j == 1 )
02560                               {
02561                                     InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_JOINING_CAUSE_BUDDY_2_ON_TEAM);
02562                               }
02563                               else
02564                               {
02565                                     InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_JOINING_CAUSE_LEARNED_TO_LIKE_BUDDY_ON_TEAM);
02566                               }
02567 
02568                               return(TRUE);
02569                         }
02570                   }
02571 
02572                   // the merc doesnt like anybody on the team
02573                   //if merc doesnt like first hated merc
02574                   if( i == 0)
02575                   {
02576                         if( gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bHatedTime[ i ] < 24 )
02577                         {
02578                               WaitForMercToFinishTalkingOrUserToClick();
02579                               InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_HATE_MERC_1_ON_TEAM);
02580                               fRetVal = FALSE;
02581                         }
02582                         else
02583                         {
02584                               InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_PERSONALITY_BIAS_WITH_MERC_1);
02585                               fRetVal = TRUE;
02586                         }
02587                   }
02588                   else if( i == 1)
02589                   {
02590                         if( gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bHatedTime[ i ] < 24 )
02591                         {
02592                               WaitForMercToFinishTalkingOrUserToClick();
02593                               InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_HATE_MERC_2_ON_TEAM);
02594                               fRetVal = FALSE;
02595                         }
02596                         else
02597                         {
02598                               InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_PERSONALITY_BIAS_WITH_MERC_2);
02599 //                            DelayMercSpeech( gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_PERSONALITY_BIAS_WITH_MERC_2, 750, TRUE, FALSE );
02600                               fRetVal = TRUE;
02601                         }
02602                   }
02603                   else
02604                   {
02605                         WaitForMercToFinishTalkingOrUserToClick();
02606                         InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_LEARNED_TO_HATE_MERC_ON_TEAM);
02607                         fRetVal = FALSE;
02608                   }
02609 
02610                   return( fRetVal );
02611             }
02612       }
02613 
02614       //Is a buddy working on the team
02615       fBuddyOnTeam = DoesMercHaveABuddyOnTheTeam( gbCurrentSoldier );
02616 
02617       //If the merc doesnt have a buddy on the team
02618       if( !fBuddyOnTeam )
02619       {
02620             // Check the players Death rate
02621             if( MercThinksDeathRateTooHigh( gbCurrentSoldier ) )
02622             {
02623                   WaitForMercToFinishTalkingOrUserToClick();
02624                   InitVideoFaceTalking( gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_DEATH_RATE_REFUSAL );
02625                   return( FALSE );
02626             }
02627 
02628             // Check the players Reputation
02629             if( MercThinksBadReputationTooHigh( gbCurrentSoldier ) )
02630             {
02631                   WaitForMercToFinishTalkingOrUserToClick();
02632                   InitVideoFaceTalking( gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_REPUTATION_REFUSAL );
02633                   return( FALSE );
02634             }
02635       }
02636 
02637       return(TRUE);
02638 }
02639 
02640 
02641 
02642 
02643 BOOLEAN DisplaySnowBackground()
02644 {
02645       UINT32            uiCurrentTime = 0;
02646   HVOBJECT  hSnowHandle;
02647       UINT8 ubCount;
02648 
02649       uiCurrentTime = GetJA2Clock();
02650 
02651       if(gubCurrentCount < VC_NUM_LINES_SNOW)
02652       {
02653             ubCount = gubCurrentCount;
02654       }
02655       else if( gubCurrentCount < VC_NUM_LINES_SNOW*2 )
02656       {
02657             ubCount = gubCurrentCount - VC_NUM_LINES_SNOW;
02658       }
02659       else
02660       {
02661             gfFirstTimeInContactScreen = FALSE;
02662             gubCurrentCount = 0;
02663             ubCount = 0;
02664 
02665             if( gubVideoConferencingMode == AIM_VIDEO_FIRST_CONTACT_MERC_MODE && gfAimMemberCanMercSayOpeningQuote )
02666                   InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_GREETING);
02667 
02668             return(TRUE);
02669       }
02670 
02671       // if it is time to update the snow image
02672       if( (uiCurrentTime - guiLastHandleMercTime) > VC_CONTACT_STATIC_TIME)
02673       {
02674             gubCurrentCount++;
02675             guiLastHandleMercTime = uiCurrentTime;
02676       }
02677       // Get the snow background, and blit it
02678       GetVideoObject(&hSnowHandle, guiBWSnow);
02679       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hSnowHandle, ubCount,AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
02680 
02681   InvalidateRegion(AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X,AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X+AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_WIDTH,AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y+AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_HEIGHT);
02682 
02683       return(FALSE);
02684 }
02685 
02686 
02687 BOOLEAN DisplayBlackBackground(UINT8 ubMaxNumOfLoops)
02688 {
02689       UINT32            uiCurrentTime = 0;
02690       UINT8             ubCount;
02691 
02692       uiCurrentTime = GetJA2Clock();
02693 
02694       if(gubCurrentCount < ubMaxNumOfLoops)
02695       {
02696             ubCount = gubCurrentCount;
02697       }
02698       else
02699       {
02700             gubCurrentCount = 0;
02701             return(TRUE);
02702       }
02703 
02704       // if it is time to update the snow image
02705       if( (uiCurrentTime - guiLastHandleMercTime) > VC_CONTACT_STATIC_TIME)
02706       {
02707             gubCurrentCount++;
02708             guiLastHandleMercTime = uiCurrentTime;
02709       }
02710       // Blit color to screen
02711       ColorFillVideoSurfaceArea( FRAME_BUFFER, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X+AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_WIDTH, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y+AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_HEIGHT, Get16BPPColor( FROMRGB( 0, 0, 0 ) ) );
02712   InvalidateRegion(AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X,AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X+AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_WIDTH,AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y+AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_HEIGHT);
02713 
02714       return(FALSE);
02715 }
02716 
02717 
02718 
02719 
02720 void HandleVideoDistortion()
02721 {
02722       static UINT32     uiStaticNoiseSound = NO_SAMPLE;
02723       UINT8       ubOldMode = gubCurrentStaticMode;
02724       
02725       // if we are just entering the contact page, display a snowy background
02726       if( gfFirstTimeInContactScreen && !gfIsAnsweringMachineActive)
02727       {
02728             DisplaySnowBackground();
02729 
02730             //if it is time to start playing another sound
02731             if( uiStaticNoiseSound == NO_SAMPLE )
02732             {
02733                   uiStaticNoiseSound = PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "LAPTOP\\static4.wav", RATE_11025, LOWVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );               
02734             }
02735       }
02736       else
02737       {
02738             switch( gubCurrentStaticMode )
02739             {
02740                   case VC_NO_STATIC:
02741                         {
02742                               static UINT32 uiCurTime=0;
02743                               UINT8 ubNum;
02744 
02745                               //if the sound is playing, stop it
02746                               if( uiStaticNoiseSound != NO_SAMPLE )
02747                               {
02748                                     SoundStop( uiStaticNoiseSound );
02749                                     uiStaticNoiseSound = NO_SAMPLE;
02750                               }
02751 
02752                               //DECIDE WHICH ONE TO BLIT NEXT
02753                               if( (GetJA2Clock() - uiCurTime) > 2500)
02754                               {
02755                                     ubNum = (UINT8)Random( 200 );//125;
02756                                     
02757                                     if( ubNum < 15)
02758                                           gubCurrentStaticMode = VC_FUZZY_LINE;
02759 
02760                                     else if( ubNum < 25)
02761                                           gubCurrentStaticMode = VC_STRAIGHTLINE;
02762 
02763                                     else if( ubNum < 35)
02764                                           gubCurrentStaticMode = VC_BW_SNOW;
02765 
02766                                     else if( ubNum < 40)
02767                                           gubCurrentStaticMode = VC_PIXELATE;
02768 
02769                                     else if( ubNum < 80)
02770                                           gubCurrentStaticMode = VC_TRANS_SNOW_OUT;
02771 
02772                                     else if( ubNum < 100)
02773                                           gubCurrentStaticMode = VC_TRANS_SNOW_IN;
02774 
02775                                     uiCurTime = GetJA2Clock();
02776                               }
02777                         }
02778                         break;
02779 
02780                   case VC_FUZZY_LINE:
02781                         gubCurrentStaticMode = DisplayDistortionLine(VC_FUZZY_LINE, guiFuzzLine, VC_NUM_FUZZ_LINES);
02782 
02783                         //if it is time to start playing another sound
02784                         if( uiStaticNoiseSound == NO_SAMPLE )
02785                         {
02786                               uiStaticNoiseSound = PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "LAPTOP\\static1.wav", RATE_11025, LOWVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );               
02787                         }
02788                         break;
02789 
02790                   case VC_STRAIGHTLINE:
02791                         gubCurrentStaticMode = DisplayDistortionLine(VC_STRAIGHTLINE, guiStraightLine, VC_NUM_STRAIGHT_LINES);
02792 
02793                         //if it is time to start playing another sound
02794                         if( uiStaticNoiseSound == NO_SAMPLE )
02795                         {
02796                               uiStaticNoiseSound = PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "LAPTOP\\static5.wav", RATE_11025, LOWVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );               
02797                         }
02798                         break;
02799 
02800                   case VC_BW_SNOW:
02801                         gubCurrentStaticMode = DisplayDistortionLine(VC_BW_SNOW, guiBWSnow, 5);
02802 
02803                         //if it is time to start playing another sound
02804                         if( uiStaticNoiseSound == NO_SAMPLE )
02805                         {
02806                               uiStaticNoiseSound = PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "LAPTOP\\static6.wav", RATE_11025, LOWVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );               
02807                         }
02808                         break;
02809 
02810                   case VC_PIXELATE:
02811                         gubCurrentStaticMode = DisplayPixelatedImage(4);
02812 
02813                         //if it is time to start playing another sound
02814                         if( uiStaticNoiseSound == NO_SAMPLE )
02815                         {
02816                               uiStaticNoiseSound = PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "LAPTOP\\static3.wav", RATE_11025, LOWVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );               
02817                         }
02818                         break;
02819                         
02820                   case VC_TRANS_SNOW_OUT:
02821                         gubCurrentStaticMode = DisplayTransparentSnow(VC_TRANS_SNOW_OUT, guiTransSnow, 7, FALSE);
02822 
02823                         //if it is time to start playing another sound
02824                         if( uiStaticNoiseSound == NO_SAMPLE )
02825                         {
02826                               uiStaticNoiseSound = PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "LAPTOP\\static5.wav", RATE_11025, LOWVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );               
02827                         }
02828                         break;
02829 
02830                   case VC_TRANS_SNOW_IN:
02831                         gubCurrentStaticMode = DisplayTransparentSnow(VC_TRANS_SNOW_IN, guiTransSnow, 7, TRUE);
02832 
02833                         //if it is time to start playing another sound
02834                         if( uiStaticNoiseSound == NO_SAMPLE )
02835                         {
02836                               uiStaticNoiseSound = PlayJA2SampleFromFile( "LAPTOP\\static4.wav", RATE_11025, LOWVOLUME, 1, MIDDLEPAN );               
02837                         }
02838                         break;
02839             }
02840 
02841             if( ubOldMode != gubCurrentStaticMode )
02842             {
02843                   uiStaticNoiseSound = NO_SAMPLE;
02844             }
02845       }
02846 }
02847 
02848 //returns true when done. else false
02849 UINT8 DisplayTransparentSnow(UINT8 ubMode, UINT32 uiImageIdentifier, UINT8 ubMaxImages, BOOLEAN bForward)
02850 {
02851   HVOBJECT  hFuzzLineHandle;
02852       static INT8 bCount= 0;
02853       UINT32            uiCurrentTime = 0;
02854       static UINT32     uiLastTime=0;
02855 
02856       uiCurrentTime = GetJA2Clock();
02857 
02858       if( (uiCurrentTime - uiLastTime) > 100)
02859       {
02860             if( bForward )
02861             {
02862                   if( bCount > ubMaxImages-1 )
02863                         bCount = 0;
02864                   else
02865                         bCount++;
02866             }
02867             else
02868             {
02869                   if( bCount <= 0 )
02870                         bCount = ubMaxImages-1;
02871                   else
02872                         bCount--;
02873             }
02874             uiLastTime = uiCurrentTime;
02875       }
02876 
02877       if( bCount >= ubMaxImages)
02878             bCount = ubMaxImages - 1;
02879 
02880       // Get the snow background, and blit it
02881       GetVideoObject(&hFuzzLineHandle, uiImageIdentifier);
02882       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFuzzLineHandle, bCount,AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
02883 
02884 
02885       if( bForward )
02886       {
02887             if( bCount == ubMaxImages-1)
02888             {
02889                   bCount = 0;
02890                   return(VC_BW_SNOW);
02891             }
02892             else
02893                   return(ubMode);
02894       }
02895       else
02896       {
02897             if( bCount == 0)
02898             {
02899                   bCount = 0;
02900                   return(VC_NO_STATIC);
02901             }
02902             else
02903                   return(ubMode);
02904       }
02905 }
02906 
02907 
02908 //returns true when done. else false
02909 UINT8 DisplayDistortionLine(UINT8 ubMode, UINT32 uiImageIdentifier, UINT8 ubMaxImages)
02910 {
02911   HVOBJECT  hFuzzLineHandle;
02912       static UINT8      ubCount=255;
02913       UINT32            uiCurrentTime = 0;
02914       static UINT32     uiLastTime=0;
02915 
02916       uiCurrentTime = GetJA2Clock();
02917 
02918       if( (uiCurrentTime - uiLastTime) > VC_CONTACT_FUZZY_LINE_TIME)
02919       {
02920             if( ubCount >= ubMaxImages-1 )
02921                   ubCount = 0;
02922             else
02923                   ubCount++;
02924             uiLastTime = uiCurrentTime;
02925       }
02926 
02927       if( ubCount >= ubMaxImages)
02928             ubCount = ubMaxImages - 1;
02929 
02930       // Get the snow background, and blit it
02931       GetVideoObject(&hFuzzLineHandle, uiImageIdentifier);
02932       BltVideoObject(FRAME_BUFFER, hFuzzLineHandle, ubCount,AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
02933 
02934       if( ubCount == ubMaxImages-1)
02935       {
02936             ubCount = 0;
02937             if( ubMode == VC_BW_SNOW)
02938                   return(VC_TRANS_SNOW_OUT);
02939             else
02940                   return(VC_NO_STATIC);
02941       }
02942       else
02943             return(ubMode);
02944 }
02945 
02946 UINT8 DisplayPixelatedImage(UINT8 ubMaxImages)
02947 {
02948       static UINT8      ubCount=255;
02949       UINT32            uiCurrentTime = 0;
02950       static UINT32     uiLastTime=0;
02951 
02952       uiCurrentTime = GetJA2Clock();
02953 
02954       if( (uiCurrentTime - uiLastTime) > VC_CONTACT_FUZZY_LINE_TIME)
02955       {
02956             if( ubCount >= ubMaxImages-1 )
02957                   ubCount = 0;
02958             else
02959                   ubCount++;
02960             uiLastTime = uiCurrentTime;
02961       }
02962 
02963 //    PixelateVideoObjectRect(  FRAME_BUFFER, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X+AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_WIDTH-1, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y+AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_HEIGHT-1);
02964       ShadowVideoSurfaceRect( FRAME_BUFFER, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_X+AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_WIDTH-1, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_Y+AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_FACE_HEIGHT-1);
02965 
02966       if( ubCount == ubMaxImages-1)
02967       {
02968             ubCount = 0;
02969             return(VC_NO_STATIC);
02970       }
02971       else
02972             return(VC_PIXELATE);
02973 }
02974 
02975 void HandleMercAttitude()
02976 {
02977       UINT32            uiCurrentTime = 0;
02978 
02979       uiCurrentTime = GetJA2Clock();
02980 
02981       if( ( gubMercAttitudeLevel <= 1 && ( ( uiCurrentTime -  guiMercAttitudeTime ) > QUOTE_FIRST_ATTITUDE_TIME ) ) || 
02982                   ( ( uiCurrentTime -  guiMercAttitudeTime ) > QUOTE_ATTITUDE_TIME ) )
02983       {
02984 
02985             if( gubMercAttitudeLevel == QUOTE_DELAY_SMALL_TALK)
02986             {
02987                   InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_SMALL_TALK);
02988             }
02989             else if( gubMercAttitudeLevel == QUOTE_DELAY_IMPATIENT_TALK)
02990             {
02991                   InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_IMPATIENT_QUOTE);
02992             }
02993             else if( gubMercAttitudeLevel == QUOTE_DELAY_VERY_IMPATIENT_TALK)
02994             {
02995                   InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_PRECEDENT_TO_REPEATING_ONESELF);
02996                   InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_IMPATIENT_QUOTE);
02997             }
02998             else if( gubMercAttitudeLevel == QUOTE_DELAY_HANGUP_TALK)
02999             {
03000                   UINT32      uiResetTime;
03001                   InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_COMMENT_BEFORE_HANG_UP);
03002 
03003                   //if the merc is going to hang up disable the buttons, so user cant press any buttons
03004 //                EnableDisableCurrentVideoConferenceButtons( FALSE);
03005                   if( gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode == AIM_VIDEO_HIRE_MERC_MODE )
03006                   {
03007                         // Enable the current video conference buttons
03008                         EnableDisableCurrentVideoConferenceButtons(FALSE);
03009                   }
03010 
03011 
03012                   //increments the merc 'annoyance' at the player
03013                   if( gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bMercStatus == 0 ) 
03014                         gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bMercStatus = MERC_ANNOYED_BUT_CAN_STILL_CONTACT;
03015                   else if( gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bMercStatus == MERC_ANNOYED_BUT_CAN_STILL_CONTACT ) 
03016                         gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bMercStatus = MERC_ANNOYED_WONT_CONTACT;
03017 
03018                   // add an event so we can reset the 'annoyance factor'
03019                   uiResetTime =  ( Random( 600 ) );
03020                   uiResetTime += GetWorldTotalMin() + MERC_ANNOYED_WONT_CONTACT_TIME_MINUTES;
03021                   AddStrategicEvent( EVENT_AIM_RESET_MERC_ANNOYANCE, uiResetTime, gbCurrentSoldier );
03022 
03023                   gfHangUpMerc = TRUE;
03024             }
03025 
03026             if( gubMercAttitudeLevel == QUOTE_MERC_BUSY )
03027             {
03028                   InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_LAME_REFUSAL);
03029                   gfHangUpMerc = TRUE;
03030             }
03031             else if( gubMercAttitudeLevel != QUOTE_DELAY_NO_ACTION )
03032                   gubMercAttitudeLevel++;
03033 
03034             guiMercAttitudeTime = GetJA2Clock();
03035       }
03036 }
03037 
03038 void StopMercTalking()
03039 {
03040       if( gfIsShutUpMouseRegionActive )
03041       {
03042         MSYS_DisableRegion(&gSelectedShutUpMercRegion); 
03043 
03044             ShutupaYoFace( giMercFaceIndex );
03045             gfMercIsTalking = FALSE;
03046             guiMercAttitudeTime = GetJA2Clock();
03047             gfIsShutUpMouseRegionActive = FALSE;
03048             gfRedrawScreen = TRUE;
03049       }
03050 }
03051 
03052 
03053 
03054 void BtnXToCloseVideoConfButtonCallback(GUI_BUTTON *btn,INT32 reason)
03055 {
03056       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_DWN )
03057       {
03058             btn->uiFlags |= BUTTON_CLICKED_ON;
03059             InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
03060       }
03061       if(reason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP )
03062       {
03063             if (btn->uiFlags & BUTTON_CLICKED_ON)
03064             {
03065                   gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_POPDOWN_MODE;
03066 //                gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE;
03067                   btn->uiFlags &= (~BUTTON_CLICKED_ON );
03068                   InvalidateRegion(btn->Area.RegionTopLeftX, btn->Area.RegionTopLeftY, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightX, btn->Area.RegionBottomRightY);
03069             }
03070       }
03071 } 
03072 
03073 
03074 BOOLEAN InitDeleteVideoConferencePopUp( )
03075 {
03076       static BOOLEAN    fXRegionActive = FALSE;
03077       static BOOLEAN    fVideoConferenceCreated = FALSE;
03078       UINT8 i;
03079       UINT16      usPosX, usPosY;
03080   VOBJECT_DESC    VObjectDesc;
03081       VSURFACE_DESC           vs_desc;
03082 
03083       //remove the face help text
03084       gfAimMemberDisplayFaceHelpText = FALSE;
03085 
03086       //Gets reset to FALSE in the HandleCurrentVideoConfMode() function
03087       gfJustSwitchedVideoConferenceMode = TRUE;
03088 
03089 
03090       //remove old mode
03091       DeleteVideoConfPopUp();
03092 
03093       //reset ( in case merc was going to say something
03094       DelayMercSpeech( 0, 0, 0, FALSE, TRUE );
03095 
03096       //if the video conferencing is currently displayed, put the 'x' to close it in the top right corner
03097       //and disable the ability to click on the BIG face to go to different screen
03098       if( ( gubVideoConferencingMode != AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE) && ( gubVideoConferencingMode != AIM_VIDEO_POPUP_MODE) )
03099       {
03100             if( !fXRegionActive )
03101             {
03102                   giXToCloseVideoConfButton = QuickCreateButton(giXToCloseVideoConfButtonImage, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_CONF_XCLOSE_X, AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_CONF_XCLOSE_Y,
03103                                                                                                       BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
03104                                                                                                       DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnXToCloseVideoConfButtonCallback);
03105                   SetButtonCursor(giXToCloseVideoConfButton, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
03106                   SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( giXToCloseVideoConfButton, DISABLED_STYLE_NONE );
03107                   fXRegionActive = TRUE;
03108 
03109                   MSYS_DisableRegion(&gSelectedFaceRegion); 
03110             }
03111       }
03112 
03113 
03114 
03115       // The video conference is not displayed
03116       if( gubVideoConferencingMode ==  AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE )
03117       {
03118             gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode = gubVideoConferencingMode;
03119             gfRedrawScreen = TRUE;
03120 
03121             if( gfVideoFaceActive )
03122             {
03123                   StopMercTalking();
03124 
03125                   //Get rid of the talking face
03126                   DeleteFace(giMercFaceIndex);
03127             }
03128 
03129             //if the ansering machine is currently on, turn it off
03130             if( gfIsAnsweringMachineActive)
03131                   gfIsAnsweringMachineActive = FALSE;
03132 
03133             gfVideoFaceActive = FALSE;
03134 
03135             if( fXRegionActive )
03136             {
03137 
03138                   RemoveButton(giXToCloseVideoConfButton );
03139                   fXRegionActive = FALSE;
03140             }
03141 
03142             MSYS_DisableRegion(&gSelectedShutUpMercRegion); 
03143 
03144             //Enable the ability to click on the BIG face to go to different screen
03145         MSYS_EnableRegion(&gSelectedFaceRegion); 
03146 
03147 //          EnableDisableCurrentVideoConferenceButtons(FALSE);
03148                   if( gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode == AIM_VIDEO_HIRE_MERC_MODE )
03149                   {
03150                         // Enable the current video conference buttons
03151                         EnableDisableCurrentVideoConferenceButtons(FALSE);
03152                   }
03153 
03154 
03155             fVideoConferenceCreated = FALSE;
03156 
03157             fNewMailFlag = gfIsNewMailFlagSet;
03158             gfIsNewMailFlagSet = FALSE;
03159 
03160       }
03161 
03162 
03163       if( gubVideoConferencingMode == AIM_VIDEO_POPUP_MODE )
03164       {
03165 
03166             gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode = gubVideoConferencingMode;
03167 
03168             if( gfJustSwitchedVideoConferenceMode )
03169             {
03170                   UINT32 uiVideoBackgroundGraphic;
03171                   HVOBJECT hImageHandle;
03172 
03173 
03174                   // load the answering machine graphic and add it
03175                   VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03176                   FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\VideoTitleBar.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03177                   CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiVideoBackgroundGraphic));
03178 
03179                   // Create a background video surface to blt the face onto
03180                   vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
03181                   vs_desc.usWidth = AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_BAR_WIDTH;
03182                   vs_desc.usHeight = AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_BAR_HEIGHT;
03183                   vs_desc.ubBitDepth = 16;
03184                   CHECKF( AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &guiVideoTitleBar) );
03185 
03186 
03187                   gfAimMemberCanMercSayOpeningQuote = TRUE;
03188 
03189                   GetVideoObject(&hImageHandle, uiVideoBackgroundGraphic);
03190                   BltVideoObject(guiVideoTitleBar, hImageHandle, 0,0,0, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03191 
03192                   DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(uiVideoBackgroundGraphic);
03193             }
03194       }
03195 
03196 
03197       // The opening animation of the vc (fuzzy screen, then goes to black)
03198       if( gubVideoConferencingMode == AIM_VIDEO_INIT_MODE )
03199       {
03200             gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode = gubVideoConferencingMode;
03201             gubMercAttitudeLevel = 0;
03202             gubContractLength = AIM_CONTRACT_LENGTH_ONE_WEEK;
03203 
03204             if( gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].usOptionalGearCost == 0 )
03205                   gfBuyEquipment = FALSE;
03206             else
03207                   gfBuyEquipment = TRUE;
03208 
03209             gfMercIsTalking = FALSE;
03210             gfVideoFaceActive = FALSE;
03211             guiLastHandleMercTime = 0;
03212             gfHangUpMerc = FALSE;
03213 
03214             fVideoConferenceCreated = TRUE;
03215       }
03216 
03217       // The screen in which you first contact the merc, you have the option to hang up or goto hire merc screen
03218       if( gubVideoConferencingMode ==  AIM_VIDEO_FIRST_CONTACT_MERC_MODE )
03219       {
03220             //if the last screen was the init screen, then we need to initialize the video face
03221             if( ( gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode == AIM_VIDEO_INIT_MODE) || ( gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode == AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE) )
03222             {
03223                   //Put the merc face up on the screen
03224                   InitVideoFace(gbCurrentSoldier);
03225 
03226 //                if( gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode == AIM_VIDEO_INIT_MODE)
03227 //                      InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_GREETING);
03228             }
03229 
03230             gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode = gubVideoConferencingMode;
03231 
03232             // Hang up button
03233             usPosX = AIM_MEMBER_AUTHORIZE_PAY_X;
03234             guiVideoConferenceButtonImage[2] = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\VideoConfButtons.sti", -1,2,-1,3,-1 );
03235             for(i=0; i<2; i++)
03236             {
03237                   giAuthorizeButton[i] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiVideoConferenceButtonImage[2], VideoConfercingText[i+AIM_MEMBER_HIRE],
03238                                                                                            FONT12ARIAL, 
03239                                                                                            AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_COLOR, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR, 
03240                                                                                            AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_COLOR, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR, 
03241                                                                                            TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
03242                                                                                            usPosX, AIM_MEMBER_HANG_UP_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
03243                                                                                            DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnFirstContactButtonCallback);
03244 
03245                   MSYS_SetBtnUserData( giAuthorizeButton[i], 0, i);
03246                   SetButtonCursor(giAuthorizeButton[i], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
03247                   usPosX += AIM_MEMBER_AUTHORIZE_PAY_GAP;
03248             }
03249 
03250             if( gfWaitingForMercToStopTalkingOrUserToClick )
03251             {
03252                   DisableButton( giAuthorizeButton[0] );
03253                   gfWaitingForMercToStopTalkingOrUserToClick = FALSE;
03254 
03255                   //Display a popup msg box telling the user when and where the merc will arrive
03256 //                DisplayPopUpBoxExplainingMercArrivalLocationAndTime( giIdOfLastHiredMerc );
03257                   giIdOfLastHiredMerc = -1;
03258             }
03259       }
03260 
03261 
03262             
03263             // The screen in which you set the contract length, and the ability to buy equipment..
03264       if( gubVideoConferencingMode == AIM_VIDEO_HIRE_MERC_MODE)
03265       {
03266             gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode = gubVideoConferencingMode;
03267 
03268             // Contract Length button
03269             guiVideoConferenceButtonImage[0] = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\VideoConfButtons.sti", -1,0,-1,1,-1 );
03270             usPosY = AIM_MEMBER_BUY_CONTRACT_LENGTH_Y;
03271             for(i=0; i<3; i++)
03272             {
03273                   giContractLengthButton[i] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiVideoConferenceButtonImage[0], VideoConfercingText[i+AIM_MEMBER_ONE_DAY], FONT12ARIAL, 
03274                                                                                                  AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_COLOR, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR, 
03275                                                                                                  AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_COLOR, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR, 
03276                                                                                                  TEXT_LJUSTIFIED, 
03277                                                                                                  AIM_MEMBER_BUY_CONTRACT_LENGTH_X, usPosY, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
03278                                                                                                  DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnContractLengthButtonCallback);
03279 
03280                   SetButtonCursor(giContractLengthButton[i], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
03281                   MSYS_SetBtnUserData( giContractLengthButton[i], 0, i);
03282                   SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( giContractLengthButton[i], DISABLED_STYLE_NONE );
03283                   usPosY += AIM_MEMBER_BUY_EQUIPMENT_GAP;
03284             }
03285 
03286             // BuyEquipment button
03287             usPosY = AIM_MEMBER_BUY_CONTRACT_LENGTH_Y;
03288             for(i=0; i<2; i++)
03289             {
03290                   giBuyEquipmentButton[i] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiVideoConferenceButtonImage[0], VideoConfercingText[i+AIM_MEMBER_NO_EQUIPMENT],
03291                                                                                                       FONT12ARIAL, 
03292                                                                                                  AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_COLOR, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR, 
03293                                                                                                  AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_COLOR, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR, 
03294                                                                                                  TEXT_LJUSTIFIED, 
03295                                                                                                  AIM_MEMBER_BUY_EQUIPMENT_X, usPosY, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
03296                                                                                                  DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnBuyEquipmentButtonCallback);
03297 
03298                   SetButtonCursor(giBuyEquipmentButton[i], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
03299                   MSYS_SetBtnUserData( giBuyEquipmentButton[i], 0, i);
03300                   SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( giBuyEquipmentButton[i], DISABLED_STYLE_SHADED );
03301                   usPosY += AIM_MEMBER_BUY_EQUIPMENT_GAP;
03302             }
03303             if( gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].usOptionalGearCost == 0 )
03304                   DisableButton( giBuyEquipmentButton[1] );
03305 
03306 
03307             // Authorize button
03308             usPosX = AIM_MEMBER_AUTHORIZE_PAY_X;
03309             guiVideoConferenceButtonImage[1] = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\VideoConfButtons.sti", -1,2,-1,3,-1 );
03310             for(i=0; i<2; i++)
03311             {
03312                         giAuthorizeButton[i] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiVideoConferenceButtonImage[1], VideoConfercingText[i+AIM_MEMBER_TRANSFER_FUNDS],
03313                                                                                                  FONT12ARIAL, 
03314                                                                                                  AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_COLOR, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR, 
03315                                                                                                  AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_COLOR, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR, 
03316                                                                                                  TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
03317                                                                                                  usPosX, AIM_MEMBER_AUTHORIZE_PAY_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
03318                                                                                                  DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnAuthorizeButtonCallback);
03319 
03320                   SetButtonCursor(giAuthorizeButton[i], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
03321                   MSYS_SetBtnUserData( giAuthorizeButton[i], 0, i);
03322                   SpecifyDisabledButtonStyle( giAuthorizeButton[i], DISABLED_STYLE_NONE );
03323                   usPosX += AIM_MEMBER_AUTHORIZE_PAY_GAP;
03324             }
03325 
03326 //          InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_LENGTH_OF_CONTRACT);
03327             DelayMercSpeech( gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_LENGTH_OF_CONTRACT, 750, TRUE, FALSE );
03328       }
03329 
03330 
03331 
03332 
03333             // The merc is not home and the player gets the answering machine
03334       if( gubVideoConferencingMode ==  AIM_VIDEO_MERC_ANSWERING_MACHINE_MODE )
03335       {
03336             gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode = gubVideoConferencingMode;
03337 
03338             gfIsAnsweringMachineActive = TRUE;
03339 
03340             // Leave msg button
03341             usPosX = AIM_MEMBER_AUTHORIZE_PAY_X;
03342             guiVideoConferenceButtonImage[2] = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\VideoConfButtons.sti", -1,2,-1,3,-1 );
03343 
03344             giAnsweringMachineButton[0] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiVideoConferenceButtonImage[2], VideoConfercingText[AIM_MEMBER_LEAVE_MESSAGE],
03345                                                                                      FONT12ARIAL, 
03346                                                                                      AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_COLOR, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR, 
03347                                                                                      AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_COLOR, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR, 
03348                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
03349                                                                                      usPosX, AIM_MEMBER_HANG_UP_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
03350                                                                                      DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnAnsweringMachineButtonCallback);
03351             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( giAnsweringMachineButton[0], 0, 0);
03352             SetButtonCursor(giAnsweringMachineButton[0], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
03353 
03354             //if the user has already left a message, disable the button
03355             if( gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].ubMiscFlags3 & PROFILE_MISC_FLAG3_PLAYER_LEFT_MSG_FOR_MERC_AT_AIM )
03356                   DisableButton( giAnsweringMachineButton[0] );
03357 
03358             usPosX += AIM_MEMBER_AUTHORIZE_PAY_GAP;
03359 
03360             giAnsweringMachineButton[1] = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiVideoConferenceButtonImage[2], VideoConfercingText[AIM_MEMBER_HANG_UP],
03361                                                                                      FONT12ARIAL, 
03362                                                                                      AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_COLOR, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR, 
03363                                                                                      AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_COLOR, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR, 
03364                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
03365                                                                                      usPosX, AIM_MEMBER_HANG_UP_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
03366                                                                                      DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnAnsweringMachineButtonCallback);
03367 
03368             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( giAnsweringMachineButton[1], 0, 1);
03369             SetButtonCursor(giAnsweringMachineButton[1], CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
03370 
03371             //The face must be inited even though the face wont appear.  It is so the voice is played
03372             InitVideoFace(gbCurrentSoldier);
03373 
03374             //Make sure the merc doesnt ramble away to the player
03375             gubMercAttitudeLevel = QUOTE_DELAY_NO_ACTION;
03376 
03377             
03378 //
03379 //DEF: TEST
03380 //
03381 /*          // load the answering machine graphic and add it
03382             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03383             FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\explosion.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03384             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &guiAnsweringMachineImage));
03385 */
03386             gubCurrentStaticMode = VC_NO_STATIC;
03387       }
03388 
03389 
03390 
03391             
03392       // The merc is home but for some reason doesnt want to work for player
03393       if( gubVideoConferencingMode == AIM_VIDEO_MERC_UNAVAILABLE_MODE)
03394       {
03395             gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode = gubVideoConferencingMode;
03396 
03397             // The hangup button 
03398             guiVideoConferenceButtonImage[2] = LoadButtonImage("LAPTOP\\VideoConfButtons.sti", -1,2,-1,3,-1 );
03399 
03400             giHangUpButton = CreateIconAndTextButton( guiVideoConferenceButtonImage[2], VideoConfercingText[AIM_MEMBER_HANG_UP],
03401                                                                                      FONT12ARIAL, 
03402                                                                                      AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_COLOR, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR, 
03403                                                                                      AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_COLOR, AIM_M_VIDEO_NAME_SHADOWCOLOR, 
03404                                                                                      TEXT_CJUSTIFIED, 
03405                                                                                      AIM_MEMBER_HANG_UP_X, AIM_MEMBER_HANG_UP_Y, BUTTON_TOGGLE, MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGH,
03406                                                                                      DEFAULT_MOVE_CALLBACK, BtnHangUpButtonCallback);
03407 
03408             MSYS_SetBtnUserData( giHangUpButton, 0, 1);
03409             SetButtonCursor(giHangUpButton, CURSOR_LAPTOP_SCREEN);
03410 
03411             //set the flag saying specifying that merc is busy
03412             gubMercAttitudeLevel = QUOTE_MERC_BUSY;
03413 
03414             InitVideoFace(gbCurrentSoldier);
03415       }
03416 
03417       if( gubVideoConferencingMode ==     AIM_VIDEO_POPDOWN_MODE )
03418       {
03419             UINT32 uiVideoBackgroundGraphic;
03420             HVOBJECT hImageHandle;
03421 
03422             if( gubPopUpBoxAction == AIM_POPUP_DISPLAY )
03423             {
03424                   return( TRUE );
03425             }
03426 
03427             gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode = gubVideoConferencingMode;
03428 
03429             gfIsAnsweringMachineActive = FALSE;
03430 
03431 
03432             // load the Video conference background graphic and add it
03433             VObjectDesc.fCreateFlags=VOBJECT_CREATE_FROMFILE;
03434             FilenameForBPP("LAPTOP\\VideoTitleBar.sti", VObjectDesc.ImageFile);
03435             CHECKF(AddVideoObject(&VObjectDesc, &uiVideoBackgroundGraphic));
03436 
03437             // Create a background video surface to blt the face onto
03438             vs_desc.fCreateFlags = VSURFACE_CREATE_DEFAULT | VSURFACE_SYSTEM_MEM_USAGE;
03439             vs_desc.usWidth = AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_BAR_WIDTH;
03440             vs_desc.usHeight = AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_BAR_HEIGHT;
03441             vs_desc.ubBitDepth = 16;
03442             CHECKF( AddVideoSurface( &vs_desc, &guiVideoTitleBar) );
03443 
03444 
03445             GetVideoObject(&hImageHandle, uiVideoBackgroundGraphic);
03446             BltVideoObject(guiVideoTitleBar, hImageHandle, 0,0,0, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY,NULL);
03447 
03448             DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(uiVideoBackgroundGraphic);
03449       }
03450 
03451 //    gfWaitingForMercToStopTalkingOrUserToClick = FALSE;
03452 
03453       //reset the time in which the merc will get annoyed
03454       guiMercAttitudeTime = GetJA2Clock();
03455       return(TRUE);
03456 }
03457 
03458 
03459 BOOLEAN DeleteVideoConfPopUp()
03460 {
03461       UINT16 i;
03462 
03463       //reset ( in case merc was going to say something
03464       DelayMercSpeech( 0, 0, 0, FALSE, TRUE );
03465 
03466       switch(     gubVideoConferencingPreviousMode )
03467       {
03468             // The video conference is not displayed
03469             case AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE:
03470             {
03471 
03472                   break;
03473             }
03474 
03475 
03476             case AIM_VIDEO_POPUP_MODE:
03477             {
03478                   DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex(guiVideoTitleBar);
03479                   break;
03480             }
03481 
03482             // The opening animation of the vc (fuzzy screen, then goes to black)
03483             case AIM_VIDEO_INIT_MODE:
03484             {
03485                   
03486                   break;
03487             }
03488 
03489 
03490 
03491             // The screen in which you first contact the merc, you have the option to hang up or goto hire merc screen
03492             case AIM_VIDEO_FIRST_CONTACT_MERC_MODE:
03493             {
03494                   //Remove the video conf buttons images
03495                   UnloadButtonImage(guiVideoConferenceButtonImage[2]);
03496 
03497                   //Remove the Hangup  buttons
03498                   for(i=0; i<2; i++)
03499                         RemoveButton(giAuthorizeButton[i] );
03500                   
03501                   break;
03502             }
03503 
03504 
03505 
03506             // The screen in which you set the contract length, and the ability to buy equipment..
03507             case AIM_VIDEO_HIRE_MERC_MODE:
03508             {
03509                   //Remove the video conf buttons images
03510                   for(i=0; i<2; i++)
03511                         UnloadButtonImage(guiVideoConferenceButtonImage[i]);
03512 
03513                   //Remove the Contracy Length button 
03514                   for(i=0; i<3; i++)
03515                         RemoveButton(giContractLengthButton[i] );
03516 
03517                   for(i=0; i<2; i++)
03518                         RemoveButton(giBuyEquipmentButton[i] );
03519 
03520                   for(i=0; i<2; i++)
03521                         RemoveButton(giAuthorizeButton[i] );
03522 
03523                   break;
03524             }
03525 
03526 
03527 
03528 
03529             // The merc is not home and the player gets the answering machine
03530             case AIM_VIDEO_MERC_ANSWERING_MACHINE_MODE:
03531             {
03532                   if( gubPopUpBoxAction == AIM_POPUP_DISPLAY )
03533                   {
03534 //                      return( TRUE );
03535                   }
03536 
03537                   //Remove the video conf buttons images
03538                   UnloadButtonImage(guiVideoConferenceButtonImage[2]);
03539 
03540                   //Remove the Answering machine buttons
03541                   for(i=0; i<2; i++)
03542                         RemoveButton(giAnsweringMachineButton[i] );
03543 
03544 //                DeleteVideoObjectFromIndex(guiAnsweringMachineImage);
03545                   break;
03546             }
03547 
03548 
03549 
03550 
03551             // The merc is home but doesnt want to work for player
03552             case AIM_VIDEO_MERC_UNAVAILABLE_MODE:
03553             {
03554                   RemoveButton(giHangUpButton );
03555                   UnloadButtonImage(guiVideoConferenceButtonImage[2]);
03556                   break;
03557             }
03558 
03559             case AIM_VIDEO_POPDOWN_MODE:
03560             {
03561                   if( gubPopUpBoxAction == AIM_POPUP_DISPLAY )
03562                   {
03563                         return( TRUE );
03564                   }
03565 
03566                   if( gfWaitingForMercToStopTalkingOrUserToClick )
03567                   {
03568                         gfWaitingForMercToStopTalkingOrUserToClick = FALSE;
03569 
03570 //                      DisplayPopUpBoxExplainingMercArrivalLocationAndTime( giIdOfLastHiredMerc );
03571                   }
03572 
03573 
03574                   gfWaitingForMercToStopTalkingOrUserToClick = FALSE;
03575                   DeleteVideoSurfaceFromIndex(guiVideoTitleBar);
03576                   break;
03577             }
03578 
03579       }
03580       return(TRUE);
03581 }

03584 
03585 
03586 BOOLEAN HandleCurrentVideoConfMode()
03587 {
03588       switch(     gubVideoConferencingMode )
03589       {
03590             // The video conference is not displayed
03591             case AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE:
03592             {
03593                   gfWaitingForMercToStopTalkingOrUserToClick = FALSE;
03594             
03595                   break;
03596             }
03597 
03598             
03599             case AIM_VIDEO_POPUP_MODE:
03600             {
03601                   BOOLEAN ubDone;
03602 
03603                   if( gfJustSwitchedVideoConferenceMode )
03604                         ubDone = DisplayMovingTitleBar( TRUE, TRUE );
03605                   else 
03606                         ubDone = DisplayMovingTitleBar( TRUE, FALSE );
03607 
03608 
03609                   if(ubDone)
03610                         gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_INIT_MODE;
03611 
03612                   break;
03613             }
03614 
03615             // The opening animation of the vc (fuzzy screen, then goes to black)
03616             case AIM_VIDEO_INIT_MODE:
03617             {
03618                   static UINT8 ubCurMode = 0;
03619                   BOOLEAN     fDone;
03620 
03621                   if( ubCurMode == 0 )
03622                   {
03623                         fDone = DisplayBlackBackground( 10 );
03624                         if( fDone )
03625                               ubCurMode = 1;
03626                   }
03627                   else
03628                         fDone = DisplaySnowBackground();
03629 
03630                   if( fDone && ubCurMode )
03631                   {
03632                         ubCurMode = 0;
03633 
03634                         gubVideoConferencingMode = WillMercAcceptCall();
03635                   }
03636 
03637                   break;
03638             }
03639 
03640             // The screen in which you first contact the merc, you have the option to hang up or goto hire merc screen
03641             case AIM_VIDEO_FIRST_CONTACT_MERC_MODE:
03642             {
03643                   //if the merc is at home, play his greeting 
03644 //                if( gfJustSwitchedVideoConferenceMode )
03645 //                      InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_GREETING);
03646                   
03647                   break;
03648             }
03649 
03650             // The screen in which you set the contract length, and the ability to buy equipment..
03651             case AIM_VIDEO_HIRE_MERC_MODE:
03652             {
03653 
03654                   break;
03655             }
03656 
03657             // The merc is not home and the player gets the answering machine
03658             case AIM_VIDEO_MERC_ANSWERING_MACHINE_MODE:
03659             {
03660                   //if the merc is not at home, play his answering machine
03661                   if( gfJustSwitchedVideoConferenceMode )
03662                   {
03663                         InitVideoFaceTalking(gbCurrentSoldier, QUOTE_ANSWERING_MACHINE_MSG);
03664                   }
03665                   
03666                   break;
03667             }
03668 
03669             // The merc is home but doesnt want to work for player
03670             case AIM_VIDEO_MERC_UNAVAILABLE_MODE:
03671             {
03672                   
03673                   break;
03674             }
03675 
03676             case AIM_VIDEO_POPDOWN_MODE:
03677             {
03678                   BOOLEAN ubDone;
03679 
03680                   if( gfJustSwitchedVideoConferenceMode )
03681                         ubDone = DisplayMovingTitleBar( FALSE, TRUE );
03682                   else 
03683                         ubDone = DisplayMovingTitleBar( FALSE, FALSE );
03684 
03685                   if(ubDone)
03686                   {
03687                         gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_NOT_DISPLAYED_MODE;
03688 
03689 
03690                         //display the popup telling the user when the just hired merc is going to land
03691                         DisplayPopUpBoxExplainingMercArrivalLocationAndTime( /*giIdOfLastHiredMerc*/ ); // no parameters (jonathanl)
03692 
03693                         //render the screen immediately to get rid of the pop down stuff
03694                         InitDeleteVideoConferencePopUp( );
03695                         RenderAIMMembers();
03696                         gfVideoFaceActive = FALSE;
03697                   }
03698 
03699                   break;
03700             }
03701       }
03702 
03703       //Gets set in the InitDeleteVideoConferencePopUp() function
03704 //    gfJustSwitchedVideoConferenceMode = FALSE;
03705 
03706       return(TRUE);
03707 }

03837 
03838 void ResetMercAnnoyanceAtPlayer( UINT8 ubMercID )
03839 {
03840       //if merc is still annoyed, reset back to 0
03841 
03842       if ( ubMercID == LARRY_NORMAL  )
03843       {
03844             if ( CheckFact( FACT_LARRY_CHANGED, 0 ) )
03845             {
03846                   ubMercID = LARRY_DRUNK;
03847             }
03848       }
03849       else if ( ubMercID == LARRY_DRUNK )
03850       {
03851             if ( CheckFact( FACT_LARRY_CHANGED, 0 ) == FALSE )
03852             {
03853                   ubMercID = LARRY_NORMAL;
03854             }
03855       }
03856       if( ( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bMercStatus == MERC_ANNOYED_WONT_CONTACT ) || ( gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bMercStatus == MERC_ANNOYED_BUT_CAN_STILL_CONTACT ) )
03857             gMercProfiles[ ubMercID ].bMercStatus = 0;
03858 }
03859 
03860 BOOLEAN DisableNewMailMessage()
03861 {
03862       if( fNewMailFlag && gubVideoConferencingMode )
03863       {
03864             gfIsNewMailFlagSet = TRUE;
03865             fNewMailFlag = FALSE;
03866             gfRedrawScreen = TRUE;
03867 
03868             return(TRUE);
03869 
03870       }
03871       return(FALSE);
03872 }
03873 
03874 BOOLEAN DisplayMovingTitleBar(BOOLEAN fForward, BOOLEAN fInit )
03875 {
03876       static      UINT8             ubCount;
03877       UINT16            usPosX, usPosY, usPosRightX, usPosBottomY, usWidth, usHeight;
03878       SGPRect           SrcRect;
03879       SGPRect           DestRect;
03880       static SGPRect          LastRect;
03881       FLOAT       usTemp;
03882 
03883       if( fForward )
03884       {
03885             if( fInit )
03886                   ubCount = 1;
03887 
03888             usTemp = (331 - 125) / (FLOAT)AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_ITERATIONS ;
03889             usPosX = (UINT16)(331 - usTemp * ubCount);
03890 
03891             usTemp = (490 - 405) / (FLOAT)AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_ITERATIONS;
03892             usPosRightX = (UINT16)(405 + usTemp * ubCount);
03893 
03894             usTemp = (AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_START_Y - 96) / (FLOAT)AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_ITERATIONS;
03895             usPosY = (UINT16)(AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_START_Y - usTemp * ubCount);
03896 
03897             usPosBottomY = AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_BAR_HEIGHT;
03898       }
03899       else
03900       {
03901             if( fInit )
03902                   ubCount = AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_ITERATIONS - 1;
03903 
03904             usTemp = (331 - 125) / (FLOAT)AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_ITERATIONS ;
03905             usPosX = (UINT16)(331 - usTemp * ubCount);
03906 
03907             usTemp = (490 - 405) / (FLOAT)AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_ITERATIONS;
03908             usPosRightX = (UINT16)(405 + usTemp * ubCount);
03909 
03910             usTemp = (AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_START_Y - 96) / (FLOAT)AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_ITERATIONS;
03911             usPosY = (UINT16)(AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_START_Y - usTemp * ubCount);
03912 
03913             usPosBottomY = AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_BAR_HEIGHT;
03914       }
03915 
03916             SrcRect.iLeft = 0;
03917             SrcRect.iTop = 0;
03918             SrcRect.iRight = AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_BAR_WIDTH;
03919             SrcRect.iBottom = AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_BAR_HEIGHT;
03920 
03921             DestRect.iLeft = iScreenWidthOffset + usPosX;
03922             DestRect.iTop = iScreenHeightOffset + usPosY;
03923             DestRect.iRight = iScreenWidthOffset + usPosRightX;
03924             DestRect.iBottom = DestRect.iTop + usPosBottomY;
03925 
03926       if( fForward )
03927       {
03928             //Restore the old rect
03929             if( ubCount > 2 )
03930             {
03931                   usWidth = (UINT16)(LastRect.iRight - LastRect.iLeft);
03932                   usHeight = (UINT16)(LastRect.iBottom - LastRect.iTop);
03933                   BlitBufferToBuffer(guiSAVEBUFFER, guiRENDERBUFFER, (UINT16)LastRect.iLeft, (UINT16)LastRect.iTop, usWidth, usHeight);
03934             }
03935 
03936             //Save rectangle
03937             if( ubCount > 1 )
03938             {
03939                   usWidth = (UINT16)(DestRect.iRight - DestRect.iLeft);
03940                   usHeight = (UINT16)(DestRect.iBottom - DestRect.iTop);
03941                   BlitBufferToBuffer(guiRENDERBUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, (UINT16)DestRect.iLeft, (UINT16)DestRect.iTop, usWidth, usHeight);
03942             }
03943       }
03944       else
03945       {
03946             //Restore the old rect
03947             if( ubCount < AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_ITERATIONS - 2 )
03948             {
03949                   usWidth = (UINT16)(LastRect.iRight - LastRect.iLeft);
03950                   usHeight = (UINT16)(LastRect.iBottom - LastRect.iTop);
03951                   BlitBufferToBuffer(guiSAVEBUFFER, guiRENDERBUFFER, (UINT16)LastRect.iLeft, (UINT16)LastRect.iTop, usWidth, usHeight);
03952             }
03953 
03954             //Save rectangle
03955             if( ubCount < AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_ITERATIONS - 1 )
03956             {
03957                   usWidth = (UINT16)(DestRect.iRight - DestRect.iLeft);
03958                   usHeight = (UINT16)(DestRect.iBottom - DestRect.iTop);
03959                   BlitBufferToBuffer(guiRENDERBUFFER, guiSAVEBUFFER, (UINT16)DestRect.iLeft, (UINT16)DestRect.iTop, usWidth, usHeight);
03960             }
03961       }
03962 
03963 
03964 
03965       BltStretchVideoSurface(FRAME_BUFFER, guiVideoTitleBar, 0, 0, VO_BLT_SRCTRANSPARENCY, &SrcRect, &DestRect );
03966   
03967       InvalidateRegion(DestRect.iLeft,DestRect.iTop, DestRect.iRight, DestRect.iBottom);
03968       InvalidateRegion(LastRect.iLeft,LastRect.iTop, LastRect.iRight, LastRect.iBottom);
03969 
03970       LastRect = DestRect;
03971 
03972       if( fForward )
03973       {
03974             ubCount++;
03975             if( ubCount == AIM_MEMBER_VIDEO_TITLE_ITERATIONS-1)
03976                   return(TRUE);
03977             else
03978                   return(FALSE);
03979       }
03980       else
03981       {
03982             ubCount--;
03983             if( ubCount == 0)
03984                   return(TRUE);
03985             else
03986                   return(FALSE);
03987       }
03988 }
03989

03991 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
03992 //TEMP:  
03993 void TempHiringOfMercs( UINT8 ubNumberOfMercs, BOOLEAN fReset )
03994 {
03995       INT16 i;
03996       UINT8 MercID[]={11,16,29,36,2,10,17,6,7,12,0,1,3,4,5,8,9,13,14,15,18,19 };
03997       MERC_HIRE_STRUCT HireMercStruct;
03998       static BOOLEAN    fHaveCalledBefore=FALSE;
03999 
04000       //if we should reset the global variable
04001       if( fReset )
04002       {
04003             fHaveCalledBefore = FALSE;
04004             return;
04005       }
04006 
04007 
04008       if( fHaveCalledBefore )
04009             return;
04010 
04011       if( guiCurrentLaptopMode != LAPTOP_MODE_NONE )
04012             return;
04013 
04014       fHaveCalledBefore = TRUE;
04015 
04016       for( i=0; i<ubNumberOfMercs; i++)
04017       {
04018             memset(&HireMercStruct, 0, sizeof(MERC_HIRE_STRUCT));
04019 
04020             if( !IsMercHireable( MercID[i] ) )
04021             {
04022                   ubNumberOfMercs++;
04023                   continue;
04024             }
04025 
04026             HireMercStruct.ubProfileID = MercID[i];
04027 
04028             //DEF: temp
04029             HireMercStruct.sSectorX = gsMercArriveSectorX;
04030             HireMercStruct.sSectorY = gsMercArriveSectorY;
04031             HireMercStruct.fUseLandingZoneForArrival = TRUE;
04032             HireMercStruct.ubInsertionCode      = INSERTION_CODE_ARRIVING_GAME;
04033 
04034             HireMercStruct.fCopyProfileItemsOver = TRUE;
04035             gMercProfiles[ MercID[i] ].ubMiscFlags |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_ALREADY_USED_ITEMS;
04036 
04037 
04038             if( gfKeyState[ ALT ] )
04039                   HireMercStruct.iTotalContractLength = 14;
04040             else if( gfKeyState[ CTRL ] )
04041                   HireMercStruct.iTotalContractLength = 7;
04042             else
04043                   HireMercStruct.iTotalContractLength = 1;
04044 
04045             //specify when the merc should arrive
04046             HireMercStruct.uiTimeTillMercArrives = GetMercArrivalTimeOfDay( );// + MercID[i];
04047 
04048             //since this is only a testing function, make the merc available
04049             gMercProfiles[ MercID[i] ].bMercStatus = 0;
04050 
04051             //if we succesfully hired the merc
04052             HireMerc( &HireMercStruct );
04053 
04054             //add an entry in the finacial page for the hiring of the merc
04055             AddTransactionToPlayersBook(HIRED_MERC, MercID[i], GetWorldTotalMin(), -(INT32)( gMercProfiles[MercID[i]].sSalary ) );
04056             
04057             if( gMercProfiles[ MercID[i] ].bMedicalDeposit )
04058             {
04059                         //add an entry in the finacial page for the medical deposit
04060                   AddTransactionToPlayersBook(  MEDICAL_DEPOSIT, MercID[i], GetWorldTotalMin(), -(gMercProfiles[MercID[i]].sMedicalDepositAmount) );
04061             }
04062 
04063             //add an entry in the history page for the hiring of the merc
04064             AddHistoryToPlayersLog(HISTORY_HIRED_MERC_FROM_AIM, MercID[i], GetWorldTotalMin(), -1, -1 );
04065       }
04066 }

04070 
04071 void DelayMercSpeech( UINT8 ubMercID, UINT16 usQuoteNum, UINT16 usDelay, BOOLEAN fNewQuote, BOOLEAN fReset )
04072 {
04073       static UINT32           uiLastTime=0;
04074       UINT32                              uiCurTime;
04075       static UINT16           usCurQuoteNum;
04076       static UINT16           usCurDelay;
04077       static BOOLEAN    fQuoteWaiting = FALSE;        //a quote is waiting to be said
04078       static UINT8            ubCurMercID;
04079       static BOOLEAN    fHangUpAfter=FALSE;
04080 
04081       uiCurTime = GetJA2Clock();
04082 
04083       if( fReset )
04084             fQuoteWaiting = FALSE;
04085 
04086       if( fNewQuote )
04087       {
04088             //set up the counters
04089             uiLastTime = uiCurTime;
04090 
04091             ubCurMercID = ubMercID;
04092             usCurQuoteNum = usQuoteNum;
04093             usCurDelay = usDelay;
04094 
04095             if( gfHangUpMerc )
04096             {
04097                   gfHangUpMerc = FALSE;
04098                   fHangUpAfter = TRUE;
04099             }
04100 
04101 
04102             fQuoteWaiting = TRUE;
04103       }
04104       
04105       
04106       if( fQuoteWaiting )
04107       {
04108             if( ( uiCurTime - uiLastTime ) > usCurDelay )
04109             {
04110                   InitVideoFaceTalking( ubCurMercID, usCurQuoteNum );
04111                   fQuoteWaiting = FALSE;
04112 
04113                   if( fHangUpAfter )
04114                   {
04115                         gfHangUpMerc = TRUE;
04116                         fHangUpAfter = FALSE;
04117                   }
04118             }
04119       }
04120 }

04128 //TEMP!!!  
04129 BOOLEAN QuickHireMerc()
04130 {
04131       INT8  bReturnCode;
04132       MERC_HIRE_STRUCT HireMercStruct;
04133       UINT8       ubCurrentSoldier = AimMercArray[gbCurrentIndex];
04134 
04135       giContractAmount = 0;
04136 
04137 //    if( !IsMercHireable( ubCurrentSoldier ) )
04138 //          return( FALSE );
04139       if( FindSoldierByProfileID( ubCurrentSoldier, TRUE ) != NULL )
04140             return( FALSE );
04141 
04142       HireMercStruct.ubProfileID = ubCurrentSoldier;
04143 
04144       //DEF: temp
04145       HireMercStruct.sSectorX = gsMercArriveSectorX;
04146       HireMercStruct.sSectorY = gsMercArriveSectorY;
04147       HireMercStruct.bSectorZ = 0;
04148       HireMercStruct.fUseLandingZoneForArrival = TRUE;
04149       HireMercStruct.ubInsertionCode      = INSERTION_CODE_ARRIVING_GAME;
04150 
04151       HireMercStruct.fCopyProfileItemsOver = TRUE;
04152       gMercProfiles[ ubCurrentSoldier ].ubMiscFlags |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_ALREADY_USED_ITEMS;
04153 
04154 
04155 
04156       if( gfKeyState[ ALT ] )
04157             HireMercStruct.iTotalContractLength = 14;
04158       else if( gfKeyState[ CTRL ] )
04159             HireMercStruct.iTotalContractLength = 7;
04160       else
04161             HireMercStruct.iTotalContractLength = 1;
04162 
04163 
04164       //specify when the merc should arrive
04165       HireMercStruct.uiTimeTillMercArrives = GetMercArrivalTimeOfDay( );// + ubCurrentSoldier;
04166 
04167       SetFlagToForceHireMerc( TRUE );
04168       bReturnCode = HireMerc( &HireMercStruct );
04169       SetFlagToForceHireMerc( FALSE );
04170       if( bReturnCode == MERC_HIRE_OVER_20_MERCS_HIRED )
04171       {
04172             //display a warning saying u cant hire more then 20 mercs
04173             DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_LAPTOP_DEFAULT, AimPopUpText[ AIM_MEMBER_ALREADY_HAVE_20_MERCS ], LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, NULL);
04174             return(FALSE);
04175       }
04176       else if( bReturnCode == MERC_HIRE_FAILED )
04177       {
04178             return(FALSE);
04179       }
04180 
04181       //add an entry in the finacial page for the hiring of the merc
04182       giContractAmount = gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].sSalary;
04183 
04184       AddTransactionToPlayersBook(HIRED_MERC, ubCurrentSoldier, GetWorldTotalMin(), -( giContractAmount ) );//- gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].sMedicalDepositAmount
04185       
04186       if( gMercProfiles[ gbCurrentSoldier ].bMedicalDeposit )
04187       {
04188             //add an entry in the finacial page for the medical deposit
04189             AddTransactionToPlayersBook(  MEDICAL_DEPOSIT, ubCurrentSoldier, GetWorldTotalMin(), -(gMercProfiles[gbCurrentSoldier].sMedicalDepositAmount) );
04190       }
04191 
04192       //add an entry in the history page for the hiring of the merc
04193       AddHistoryToPlayersLog(HISTORY_HIRED_MERC_FROM_AIM, ubCurrentSoldier, GetWorldTotalMin(), -1, -1 );
04194 
04195       gfRedrawScreen = TRUE;
04196 
04197       return( TRUE );
04198 }

04200 
04201 void TempHandleAimMemberKeyBoardInput()
04202 {
04203       InputAtom                           InputEvent;
04204 
04205       while (DequeueEvent(&InputEvent) == TRUE)
04206       {//!HandleTextInput( &InputEvent ) && 
04207             if( InputEvent.usEvent == KEY_DOWN )
04208             {
04209                   switch (InputEvent.usParam)
04210                   {
04211 #ifdef JA2TESTVERSION
04212                         case SPACE:
04213                               QuickHireMerc();
04214                               break;
04215 
04216                         case '~':
04217                               // to test going on other assignments, unhired merc improvements & deaths
04218                               if (guiDay == 1) guiDay++;
04219                               MercDailyUpdate();
04220                               gfRedrawScreen = TRUE;
04221                               break;
04222 #endif
04223 
04224                         default:
04225                               HandleKeyBoardShortCutsForLapTop( InputEvent.usEvent, InputEvent.usParam, InputEvent.usKeyState );
04226                               break;
04227                   }
04228             }
04229       }
04230 }
04231 
04232 #endif
04233 
04234 
04235 void WaitForMercToFinishTalkingOrUserToClick()
04236 {
04237       //if the region is not active
04238       if( !gfIsShutUpMouseRegionActive )
04239       {
04240             //Enables it so if a player clicks, he will shutup the merc
04241             MSYS_EnableRegion(&gSelectedShutUpMercRegion); 
04242             gfIsShutUpMouseRegionActive = TRUE;
04243       }
04244 
04245       if( gfIsAnsweringMachineActive )
04246             gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_MERC_ANSWERING_MACHINE_MODE;
04247       else
04248             gubVideoConferencingMode = AIM_VIDEO_FIRST_CONTACT_MERC_MODE;
04249 
04250       gfWaitingForMercToStopTalkingOrUserToClick = TRUE;
04251       gfHangUpMerc = TRUE;
04252       gfStopMercFromTalking = FALSE;
04253 }

04287 #if defined ( JA2TESTVERSION )
04288 
04289 void DemoHiringOfMercs( )
04290 {
04291       INT16 i;
04292       #ifdef GERMAN
04293             UINT8 MercID[]={ 7, 10, 4, 14, 50 };
04294       #else
04295             UINT8 MercID[]={ 7, 10, 4, 42, 33 };
04296       #endif
04297       MERC_HIRE_STRUCT HireMercStruct;
04298       static BOOLEAN    fHaveCalledBefore=FALSE;
04299 
04300       if( fHaveCalledBefore )
04301             return;
04302 
04303       fHaveCalledBefore = TRUE;
04304 
04305       if( guiCurrentLaptopMode != LAPTOP_MODE_NONE )
04306             return;
04307 
04308       for( i=0; i<5; i++)
04309       {
04310             memset(&HireMercStruct, 0, sizeof(MERC_HIRE_STRUCT));
04311 
04312             HireMercStruct.ubProfileID = MercID[i];
04313 
04314             //DEF: temp
04315             HireMercStruct.sSectorX = 1;
04316             HireMercStruct.sSectorY = 16;
04317             HireMercStruct.ubInsertionCode      = INSERTION_CODE_ARRIVING_GAME;
04318 
04319             HireMercStruct.fCopyProfileItemsOver = TRUE;
04320             gMercProfiles[ MercID[i] ].ubMiscFlags |= PROFILE_MISC_FLAG_ALREADY_USED_ITEMS;
04321 
04322 
04323             HireMercStruct.iTotalContractLength = 60;
04324 
04325             //specify when the merc should arrive
04326             HireMercStruct.uiTimeTillMercArrives = GetMercArrivalTimeOfDay( );// + MercID[i];
04327 
04328             //since this is only a testing function, make the merc available
04329             gMercProfiles[ MercID[i] ].bMercStatus = 0;
04330 
04331             //if we succesfully hired the merc
04332             HireMerc( &HireMercStruct );
04333 
04334             //add an entry in the finacial page for the hiring of the merc
04335             AddTransactionToPlayersBook(HIRED_MERC, MercID[i], GetWorldTotalMin(), -(INT32)( gMercProfiles[MercID[i]].sSalary ) );
04336             
04337             if( gMercProfiles[ MercID[i] ].bMedicalDeposit )
04338             {
04339                         //add an entry in the finacial page for the medical deposit
04340                   AddTransactionToPlayersBook(  MEDICAL_DEPOSIT, MercID[i], GetWorldTotalMin(), -(gMercProfiles[MercID[i]].sMedicalDepositAmount) );
04341             }
04342 
04343             //add an entry in the history page for the hiring of the merc
04344             AddHistoryToPlayersLog(HISTORY_HIRED_MERC_FROM_AIM, MercID[i], GetWorldTotalMin(), -1, -1 );
04345       }
04346 }
