04351 
04352 void DisplayPopUpBoxExplainingMercArrivalLocationAndTime( )
04353 {
04354       CHAR16      szLocAndTime[512];
04355       SOLDIERTYPE *pSoldier = NULL;
04356       CHAR16            zTimeString[128];
04357       CHAR16            zSectorIDString[512];
04358       UINT32            uiHour;
04359 
04360       //if the id of the merc is invalid, dont display the pop up
04361       if( LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.iIdOfMerc == -1 )
04362             return;
04363 
04364       //if the pop up has already been displayed, dont display it again for this occurence of laptop
04365       if( LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.fHaveDisplayedPopUpInLaptop )
04366             return;
04367 
04368       pSoldier = FindSoldierByProfileID( (UINT8)LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.iIdOfMerc, TRUE );
04369 
04370       if( pSoldier == NULL )
04371             return;
04372 
04373       //calc the approximate hour the mercs will arrive at
04374       uiHour = ( ( LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.uiArrivalTime ) - ( ( ( LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.uiArrivalTime ) / 1440 ) * 1440 ) ) / 60;
04375       
04376       //create the time string
04377       swprintf( zTimeString, L"%02d:%02d", uiHour, 0 );
04378 
04379       //get the id string
04380       GetSectorIDString( gsMercArriveSectorX, gsMercArriveSectorY, 0, zSectorIDString, FALSE );
04381 
04382       //create the string to display to the user, looks like....
04383       //    L"%s should arrive at the designated drop-off point ( sector %d:%d %s ) on day %d, at approximately %s.",         //first %s is mercs name, next is the sector location and name where they will be arriving in, lastely is the day an the time of arrival
04384 
04385 #ifdef GERMAN
04386       //Germans version has a different argument order
04387       swprintf( szLocAndTime, pMessageStrings[ MSG_JUST_HIRED_MERC_ARRIVAL_LOCATION_POPUP ], 
04388                                           gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].zNickname, 
04389                                           LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.uiArrivalTime / 1440, 
04390                                           zTimeString,
04391                                           zSectorIDString );
04392 #else
04393       swprintf( szLocAndTime, pMessageStrings[ MSG_JUST_HIRED_MERC_ARRIVAL_LOCATION_POPUP ], 
04394                                           gMercProfiles[ pSoldier->ubProfile ].zNickname, 
04395                                           zSectorIDString,
04396                                           LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.uiArrivalTime / 1440, 
04397                                           zTimeString );
04398 #endif
04399 
04400 
04401 
04402       //display the message box
04403       DoLapTopMessageBox( MSG_BOX_LAPTOP_DEFAULT, szLocAndTime, LAPTOP_SCREEN, MSG_BOX_FLAG_OK, DisplayPopUpBoxExplainingMercArrivalLocationAndTimeCallBack );
04404 
04405       //reset the id of the last merc
04406       LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.iIdOfMerc = -1;
04407 
04408       //set the fact that the pop up has been displayed this time in laptop
04409       LaptopSaveInfo.sLastHiredMerc.fHaveDisplayedPopUpInLaptop = TRUE;
04410 
04411 }
04412 
04413 void DisplayPopUpBoxExplainingMercArrivalLocationAndTimeCallBack( UINT8 bExitValue )
04414 {
04415       //unset the flag so the msgbox WONT dislay its save buffer
04416       gfDontOverRideSaveBuffer = FALSE;
04417 
04418       if( guiCurrentLaptopMode == LAPTOP_MODE_AIM_MEMBERS )
04419       {
04420             //render the screen
04421             gfRedrawScreen = TRUE;
04422             RenderAIMMembers();
04423       }
04424 }
04425 
04426 void DisplayAimMemberClickOnFaceHelpText()
04427 {
04428       //display the 'left and right click' onscreen help msg
04429       DrawTextToScreen( AimMemberText[0], AIM_FI_LEFT_CLICK_TEXT_X, AIM_FI_LEFT_CLICK_TEXT_Y, AIM_FI_CLICK_TEXT_WIDTH, AIM_FI_HELP_TITLE_FONT, AIM_FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED  );                
04430       DrawTextToScreen( AimMemberText[1], AIM_FI_LEFT_CLICK_TEXT_X, AIM_FI_LEFT_CLICK_TEXT_Y+AIM_FI_CLICK_DESC_TEXT_Y_OFFSET, AIM_FI_CLICK_TEXT_WIDTH, AIM_FI_HELP_FONT, AIM_FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED      );                
04431 
04432       DrawTextToScreen( AimMemberText[2], AIM_FI_RIGHT_CLICK_TEXT_X, AIM_FI_LEFT_CLICK_TEXT_Y, AIM_FI_CLICK_TEXT_WIDTH, AIM_FI_HELP_TITLE_FONT, AIM_FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED );                
04433       DrawTextToScreen( AimMemberText[3], AIM_FI_RIGHT_CLICK_TEXT_X, AIM_FI_LEFT_CLICK_TEXT_Y+AIM_FI_CLICK_DESC_TEXT_Y_OFFSET, AIM_FI_CLICK_TEXT_WIDTH, AIM_FI_HELP_FONT, AIM_FONT_MCOLOR_WHITE, FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK, FALSE, CENTER_JUSTIFIED     );                
04434 }
